name: Puzzle Adventures
description: A choose your own adventure game where the player is tasked with finding out how they ended up in the small house on the beach. To answer this mystery the player must solve puzzles and make choices to explore the story.

name: Town of Dusk
description: Players will enter the Town of Dusk, built on the eve of Empire of Japan's defeat in World War II, along with other characters. Avoid being killed by other characters! Find the mastermind behind the scenes, unravel all the conspiracies, and uncover the 'true' truth! Also Escape the Town of Dusk!

name: Puzzle Go!
description: Puzzle Go! is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. Players use the mouse to adjust the position of the tiles to restore the picture. As a player, this game provides multiple exquisite CGs as levels. At the same time, the game has carefully prepared a rich achievement system for players.

name: HoleHole
description:
"HoleHole" is a relaxed adventure game where players freely explore a map, collect objects, and assist residents through conversations. The game features a visual novel-style storytelling experience and allows players to progress at their own pace.

One day, the player accidentally falls into a certain hole and freely explores the dungeon to find objects and search for residents. However, it is also a player's choice to not engage in exploration.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Additional Area "Rosca Island"
description:
Adds a new region (open field) and World Quests unique to that region.
This content requires the game clear data in order to play.

name: Highway Traffic Racer
description: Highway Traffic Racer is a new word in the endless arcade racing genre. Drive on the highway, earn money, upgrade your car and buy new ones.

name: Spirit of the Island: Beach Resort
description: Spirit of the Island: Beach Resort is set to bring this much requested feature at no additional cost! With the new DLC, you will have the option to pick a brand new starting location — Beach Resort.

name: Hypnospace Outlaw & Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath: Vengance of the Slayer Bundle
description: 2 games in one bundle!

name: Stroke The Dik-Dik
description:
The Dik-Dik is a small antelope, by nature they are pretty shy and will often run away if you try to approach it. This one tough, it's friendly and will stand to attention allowing you to stroke it.

Stroke your own Dik-Dik in your own living room, bedroom, bathroom, wherever you have your TV.

name: Beat Them Up: Street Fight Band Simulator
description: A game in the classic and familiar Beat Them Up genre, in tribute to history, everything in the game is done according to the old traditions of beat em up games, but with nicer graphics and more convenient controls.

name: Mad Road: Apocalyptic Shooter Survival Killer
description: Get ready for an addictive and lowpoly gaming experience in "Mad Road"! Take control of a lone biker on a mission to cleanse the world from threats and chaos.

name: Ghost Signal: Fleet Expansion
description: This free update adds two new ships - the Pandora and the Iris - with unique characteristics, a Relaxed Mode, and an Autosave feature.

name: Arcade Archives: Tetris - The Absolute: The Grand Master 2 Plus
description:
From beginner to advanced!
Challenge various modes! !

name: Million Shells
description:
Manage 15 cannons attached to a huge battleship
and shoot down the enemies that appear.
This is an exhilarating tower defense shooting game!

name: Move The Box: Classic Block Puzzle
description: A classic puzzle game in which you have to move blocks and match them three in a row!

name: Japanese Nekosama Escape: The Sweets Shop
description: I was having good time in a friend-recommended sweets shop. I found myself in a big trouble…

name: Morrok
description: In this point & cklick adventure join young detective Rudolf Pasaret to solve the greatest mystery of the 19th century. Guide the detective along the brink of insanity through a world created by an evil madman as you unravel a mystery of black magic and false accusations to discover the truth.

name: Gnome
description: You're taking care of your friend's house but a garden gnome appears.

name: Spiral Up
description: An extremely challenging 2D Platformer made by a bunch of Jump King lovers: breach the sky, or torture yourself, with spring and gravity. Can also be played with your friends, either for a race or for co-op.

name: A Street Cat's Tale 2: Out side is Dangerous
description: A Street Cat's Tale 2 follows Cinnamon, who wanders out the window in pursuit of a butterfly. It is a Sokoban-based, narrative-led puzzle adventure game about the struggles of stray cats.

name: That's My Space
description: The universe is yours to conquer in That's My Space. Gather resources, craft powerful weapons, upgrade your spaceship and battle against enemy nations to become the ultimate space explorer.

name: Budget Cuts Ultimate
description:
Zip, sneak, and stab your way through a heart-pounding dystopia filled with evil robots! What began as a cost-cutting strategy has spiraled out of control, and now it’s up to you to save humanity from being optimized out of existence. Budget Cuts Ultimate is the essential VR action stealth game, containing all previously released games and content updates.

As your last human co-worker is hauled away, a mysterious briefcase from someone on the outside is delivered to your desk. You need to get to the bottom of what is going on at TransCorp.

Sneak around enemy robots by climbing through air ducts and service tunnels, or embrace violence by unleashing a fistful of knives, quivers of arrows, grenades, and coffee mugs onto their unsuspecting circuits. Once you’ve completed your mission, test your skills in the arcade with multiple modes, difficulty levels, and scoring.

name: Korokoro Harley
description:
The world's most "edgy" action game has arrived!
The hedgehog "Harley" who rolls and puts out a needle, unfolds a great adventure!

name: Barrett Foster: Chapter One
description:
Barrett Foster a realistic puzzle game in which you play the famous inspector solving a dramatic personal investigation: The disappearance of Emma and Gabriel, close friends of Barrett.

Explore your environment and solve different puzzles to progress and find answers !

name: Class of '09: The Re-Up
description: The rejection sim returns! Explore a slice of chaotic life in late 2000's American high school as you assume the role of Nicole once again. A 100% fully voiced VN presenting as the most culturally accurate period piece in the history of gaming.

name: Eye 4 Eye
description: Embark on a mission to unveil the truth behind a missing daughter case. Utilize the search engine to gather clues and uncover the dark secrets of TempleTech. Experience a suspenseful journey through the eyes of Hazel.

name: Arobynn: Below The Surface
description: Finally, the multiplayer VR dungeon crawler we've all been waiting for! Complete with floor bosses, traps, and a glowing immersive environment. Dive into the depths, upgrade your gear, and work your way farther into the unknown dark below the surface!

name: Chrono Crystal
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Blooby Block
description: Help Block rescue his friends from the terrible bluebies. This cube pushing puzle Game is an evolution of the clasic sokoban/box pushing type games in a multilevel 3D. Enemies, spells and traps add another level of complexity. The difficulty grows fast, and the puzles become unforgiving very soon.

name: Tears Fall Low
description: Unravel the mystery of a fallen tear on its journey back to the surface!

name: Ceteris Paribus
description: Ceteris Paribus is an educational point&click game aimed at providing basic economics literacy to players 13 and up. Kai is in need of last-minute help with their Economics homework and Pavlos teaches them concepts, terms and events through hidden-object and drag-and-drop mini-games.

name: Save the World
description: In a world plagued by conflict, greed, and division, hope arrives from beyond the stars. The aliens have come to Earth, and they're listening to everything you say and make it a reality. What will you do with all this sudden power? Will you be able to save the world?

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Nordics
description: Immerse yourself in the rich culture and history of the Nordics

name: Longevity Party
description: "Longevity Party" is an unconventional third-person shooter game. In this fun party, there is no death, you can't use guns to kill your opponent, you can only knock him out of the field, at the same time, you can also change the terrain, create random obstacles, Win the day.

name: Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition version announced for Japan with a limited quantity of 10,000 copies available for purchase according to the site.
This physical edition Includes a download code for the Persona Characters DLC and a Nintendo Switch stylus.

Create endless adventures with the Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection!

Explore the rich beginnings of this RPG franchise with remasters of three timeless adventures that inspire players to go on a journey of discovery, mapping deep dungeons, and building customized parties for exploring and engaging in tactical combat. Play as the leader of a guild of adventurers, searching for rare treasures and secrets within the depths of a vast, sprawling labyrinth. Traverse and draw a map of the environment while encountering enemies large and small in turn-based combat, then return to town to rest, sell materials for better equipment, and manage your party, selecting from a collection of heroes to build the right team for the job.

Survive a vast, labyrinthian forest on the edge of a peaceful village in Etrian Odyssey HD, journey to a floating castle in the sky in Etrian Odyssey II HD, and be transported to an oceanic paradise and rumors of a drowned city in Etrian Odyssey III HD.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey III HD
description:
Etrian Odyssey III HD brings the timeless adventure set in Armoroad, a sea city facing the aftermath of a great calamity.

Build your own party of explorers from the all-new twelve different character classes. Descend the labyrinth that swallowed the mystery of Armoroad and the drowned city.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey II HD
description:
Etrian Odyssey II HD rebirths the timeless adventure of the mysterious floating castle.

Build your own party from twelve different classes of heroes and climb through the Yggdrasil tree to reach the clouds and uncover the truth of High Lagaard.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey: Origins Collection
description:
Create endless adventures with the Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection!

Explore the rich beginnings of this RPG franchise with remasters of three timeless adventures that inspire players to go on a journey of discovery, mapping deep dungeons, and building customized parties for exploring and engaging in tactical combat. Play as the leader of a guild of adventurers, searching for rare treasures and secrets within the depths of a vast, sprawling labyrinth. Traverse and draw a map of the environment while encountering enemies large and small in turn-based combat, then return to town to rest, sell materials for better equipment, and manage your party, selecting from a collection of heroes to build the right team for the job.

Survive a vast, labyrinthian forest on the edge of a peaceful village in Etrian Odyssey HD, journey to a floating castle in the sky in Etrian Odyssey II HD, and be transported to an oceanic paradise and rumors of a drowned city in Etrian Odyssey III HD.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey HD
description:
Etrian Odyssey HD remasters the timeless adventure of the labyrinth that swallows all.

Build a party of explorers from nine different character classes - Create a woodland survivalist, shield-bearing protector, whip-wielding dark hunter, and more. Scour through the dungeon's many layers and fend off the unknown to discover the truth behind the Yggdrasil Labyrinth.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, difficulty options and save slots

name: Sylvio and the Mountains Giants
description: An unknow evil has come to disturb the fragile balance of the land of Yahouna. Only a clever and pure being can save them all...

name: Aery: The Lost Hero
description: Aery: The Lost Hero is a story-driven, narrative 3D flight exploration game. You control a little bird on its journey to find a long-forgotten hero. Discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Zero to Hero
description: Zero to Hero is a roguelike tactics game where you play a contestant on a 1960s game show. You get super powers, and have to overcome a gauntlet of challenges. If you get to the end, you get to keep your powers. Choose amazing upgrades and incredible transformations to go from Zero to Hero!

name: Driftwood
description: A game about downhill longboarding and a sloth named Eddy. Ride as fast as you can and watch out that you don't fly out of a curve!

name: Mythrel
description: A multiplayer online trading card game! Build your collection and decks, battle your friends, trade cards, and dominate the Seasonal Leagues!

name: Septaroad Voyager
description: Seven heroes. Infinite adventures. Embark on an epic journey through a vast world filled with danger. Assign tactics to your party members or control them individually in fast-paced battles. Discover the captivating tale of Septaroad Voyager.

name: Mislight
description:
A Side Scroller Adventure game with a slight touch of Thriller.
Use the powers of your flashlight to light up the shadow creatures that roam trought the forest and seek your way out!

name: Pandamonium
description: A panda who stumbles into the Lost Capital of Hell. Explore a beautiful and dangerous world with hand drawn crisp pixel art and 2.5D graphics. Face perilous foes, bosses and friendly allies. Customize yourself with abilities and outfits that will help you conquer your way through this doomed land.

name: Desordre: A Puzzle Game Adventure
description: Desordre is a first-person puzzle game, inspired by the Portal series, in which you solve each puzzle by traveling through two timelines the same room. You have at your disposal a portal gun and the ability to slow down time.

name: Clientele
description: Clientele is a sexy deckbuilder management game. Become a sex worker and satisfy the needs of your Clients. Make the deck you want, buy, unlock more cards, and upgrade skills to keep up with your Client's demands, in this uniquely crafted game about the most interesting career in the world.

name: Homebody
description: Homebody is a survival horror puzzle game about a group of friends haunted by memories of the past and hunted by a relentless killer. Move on or die trying.

name: We Are One
description: Work together with yourself in VR! We Are One is a puzzle shooter where you solve mind-bending puzzles by cloning yourself and playing with time loops. Cleverly plan ahead and cooperate with your own clones - the only help you really need (and get) is yourself!

name: Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath - Vengance of the Slayer
description: So.... got what it takes to be a X Slayer?!?... 7 weapons, blood and gore, twisted music by Seepage & Psyko Syndikate, and maps where you can blow up everything. its awesome. started making it in 1998 in high school with my friend and now im 37, so i have life experience now.

name: Loop8: Summer of Gods
description:
In this original coming-of-age RPG, step into the life of Nini, a newly earthbound teen who arrives in the quaint Japanese town of Ashihara in August 1983. Explore the town, befriend its people, and face off against the Kegai in turn-based battles where the outcomes depend on the relationships you’ve built and the decisions you’ve made. Use Nini’s special connection to the gods to reset the world, with each loop allowing Nini and his allies to relive the 8th month over and over until they get it right…or the Kegai overcome them entirely.
With one month until the world ends, how will you spend each day?

name: Fall of the New Age
description: Mankind has just got out from the dark Middle Ages. Superstitions and fears still reign the minds of the majority of people, but the germs of science and culture rapidly emerge and grow stronger. But, as it turns out, it doesn’t play into the hands of some of those in power.

name: Myriads: Renaissance
description: Myriads: Renaissance is a turn-based strategy game with city-building and 4X mechanics. Set in a fantasy world made up of thousands of floating islands, you must grow your capital and expand your kingdom. Resist waves of powerful corsairs and construct defence towers to survive their incursions.

name: No More Rainbows
description:
No More Rainbows brings the fun of a classic platformer to VR. Use the intuitive locomotion mechanics to run, jump, and climb using only your hands.

As the Beast, rampage through colorful worlds to reclaim your desecrated Underworld. Extend your experience with 3v3 multiplayer game mode to become the world’s most respected beast!

name: Battle Talent
description:
The Next-Gen of VR Sword-Fighting. Battle Talent is a challenging physics-based roguelite sword-fighting game.

Battle Talent brings physics driven creatures to life. You'll get to epic boss battles like you've never experienced before.

Single-player, rogue-lite, dungeon-based, advanced-physics, VR action-adventure, combat simulator with procedurally generated dungeons that simulates the fantasy of exploring a dungeon, & defeating RPG-themed enemies to grow stronger for your next dungeon playthrough. Gold earned from beating rooms & the dungeon can be used to unlock new weapons, abilities, and stat increases. You can customize each dungeon run by enabling, & disabling weapons, abilities & stat increases, allowing you to create certain builds and set-ups.

It comes with multi-Language support, Quest Support, & Mod Support.

name: Help Yourself
description: Solve action-packed FPS puzzles by cloning yourself and playing around with time! Help Yourself is a puzzle shooter where you must work together with yourself! Cleverly plan ahead and cooperate with your clones in a time loop.

name: Comrades and Barons: Gates of Freedom
description: The Great War had barely ended, when Red Army started an offensive westwards to ignite the revolution in Europe. Comrades and Barons: Gates of Freedom is a hex wargame that lets you to relive the events on the battlefields of this turbulent time.

name: Zero-G Gunfight
description: A 2D arena shooter set in outer space where you use your guns to move and kill each other! Prepare yourself for the fast paced arenas of Zer0-G Gunfight where only the best will survive and bring their nations one set closer to intergalactic supremacy!

name: TailQuest: Defense
description: TailQuest: Defense is an unique mix of tower defense and 3D puzzle platformer. Join Nell as he tries to defend a vivid world from an invasion of colorful robots.

name: Killer Frequency
description: Killer Frequency is a first-person horror adventure that puts you in the shoes of Forrest Nash, a late-night radio host whose callers are being stalked by a mysterious killer. Solve puzzles, save lives and run the switchboards, all while listening to a jukebox of retro ‘80s tunes!

name: RivenTails Defense
description: RivenTails: Defense is an unique mix of Tower Defense with 3D puzzle platformer. Join Nell as he tries to defend a vivid world from the invasion of colorful robots.

name: Last Dream: Complete Edition
description:
This version includes:

- Last Dream
- Last Dream: World Unknown

name: Quasimorph: End of Dream
description: Quasimorph: End of Dream is the first chapter of the extraction turn-based RPG Quasimorph. Confront your fears in brutal shootouts with PMC -fighters and demons and try to survive to complete your mission and bring the gear back to your spaceship!

name: Farting Simulator
description: Get ready for a gut-busting good time with Farting Simulator! You experience the joy of controlling an uncontrollable bodily function in a meme-filled and comedic open-world sandbox environment. Farting Simulator is a hilarious and entertaining adventure that's sure to leave you FARTING out loud.

name: The Great Fumo Binning
description: Sin descripción

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 7
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Where the Anemones Bloom
description: Cordelia leads a life that most mermaids would envy. She has close friends and is part of a prominent pod, her future is all planned out. But Cordelia isn’t most mermaids. When her pod moves to the coast, she’s warned about the forbidden shallows and the dangers that lurk beyond. She’s heard all the rumours of course, but none of her friends will go near it. Curiosity gets the better of Cordelia, and she soon finds herself trembling at the fearful lights and hum of this strange city. However, something - someone actually - has also caught her eye. What starts as mere curiosity blossoms into something far more interesting. Soon Cordelia questions who she really is, and what she really wants. As she ventures further into uncharted territory, she gets closer to love but further from who she is and what she knows. Will she risk it all for a taste of the forbidden?

name: Fate/Zero the Visual Novel
description: A fanmade visual novel based on the light novel Fate/Zero

name: Touhou Mini Map
description: Touhou Mini Map is a strategy building game that allows you to create a panoramic map of Touhou World.

name: Country Star
description: Tap and Swipe to the instruments, vocals or beats to master your favorite song.

name: Radikal Bikers
description: A cancelled Game Boy Color port of Radikal Bikers.

name: MagicArchitect
description: One Thousand and One Shooting. Cultivate magic, sell it off, and make a profit! you can choose your character!

name: Pony in Backrooms
description: Pony in Backrooms is a My Little Pony fangame based on the backrooms.

name: Oneirology Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Gunfire Reborn: Artisan and Magician
description: Two new heroes will join your adventure. You can choose to either strategically command the power of the star card or summon a mecha to fight alongside you. At the same time, they also bring four new weapons, including a submachine gun, a compass, an squid, and... a brick that conceals subtle golden sheen.

name: Sugar Mess: Let's Play Jolly Battle
description: Sugar Mess: Let's Play Jolly Battle is a fun arcade first-person shooter for the whole family. Shoot from a variety of weapons at hilarious opponents! Pass colorful levels with different mechanics and immerse yourself in a fascinating story!

name: Idle Dragon Clicker: Expansion Pack 3
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Idle Dragon Clicker: Expansion Pack 2
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Kinder World
description: Kinder World is more than a cozy houseplant game.

name: Chrono Crystal: Archie
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Homicipher: Prologue
description: Homicipher is an adventure horror game where you’ll decipher a language, fall in love and escape. Players will face various horrifying men in this strange world. Your aim is to decipher their language and eventually find a way to escape. Meanwhile, a peculiar feeling also starts to bloom.

name: Chrono Crystal: Factory DLC
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Chrono Crystal: Giant Gate DLC
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Quatro!: This is fine DLC
description: Heat Up With the Quatro! This is fine DLC

name: Feed Eggs
description: Put as many eggs as you can in its mouth

name: Sandbox
description: The goal of the game is to collect 22 bills. To collect them, you need to press the "play" button and move to the sandbox level.

name: Neon D-Fence Remaster
description: An AI menace is headed to your motherboard! Can you survive?

name: Dungeon Boss: Respawned
description: Battle. Explore. Defend. Summon a crew of mighty heroes to guard your dungeons, steal treasure and fight foes. Assemble a team of warriors, goblins and other mighty heroes to embark on an epic adventure across fantasy lands.

name: Worlds War 1
description: Worlds War 1 is a shooter sci-fi game where you fight against all odds in a battle to save the earth from the aliens who started attacking the earth - and your home.

name: We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition contains the We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie game along with the Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack.

[Set Contents]
Main Game
Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack

■Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack
[Contents]

*25 songs added that can be played in stages of We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie.
*All songs are recorded in the game.

name: Hero's Hour: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Eperon Defend
description: This time you have to protect the Eperon planet from the meteors, which are incoming.

name: Project: Playtime - Phase 2: Incineration
description: Phase 2 is finally here! The horrors continue with an all-new map along with a host of new terrifying monster skins, and intricate survivor skins. Phase 2 also expands on gameplay with new puzzles, a UI overhaul, and a slough of quality of life upgrades.

name: Fritz: Don't Call Me a Chess Bot
description: Play chess with interactive hints and tips

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Yajilin
description: Draw lines through the centers of cells to make a loop, and paint cells black in this original Nikoli puzzle. It's immensely satisfying to see how the lines and black cells all come together to form a solution, and figuring out how to draw the loop isn't as easy as it might seem.

name: RuneLight
description: RuneLight is a Horde Survival Action Roguelite where you choose your equipment, craft your weapon to fit your build, and discover powerful fusions in order to take down hordes of powerful elementals

name: Tasukemono
description: A new style "strategy-like" puzzle game! Control multiple cute characters and navigate a little girl to the goal! As the girl gets deep into the forests, her secret will be revealed...

name: Just Skill Shooter
description: Just Skill Shooter is a first-person shooter game where you take on the role of a soldier fighting enemies in two different maps. You have access to different weapons - a rifle, a shotgun or other- which you can use to eliminate enemy combatants.

name: Unknown Memoirs: The Rental
description: "Unknown Memoirs" is a short horror game series focusing on distressing tales of horror. "The Rental" centers on the main character moving into a rental that they found online. Little do they know of the horrors that await them.

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines
description: Get ready for the Glass Masquerade sequel! With brand new textured glass pieces, immerse yourself in the beautiful world of painted glass art. Assemble jigsaw puzzles inspired by different cultures and themes with new play modes and various fragments cuts.

name: Laserpitium
description: Blast off on a critical mission to free the galaxy from artificial governance in this side-scrolling 2D shoot’em up!

name: Bifröst: Through the Realms
description: Bifröst: Through the Realms is a fast-paced multidimensional platformer with Norse and Sci-Fi themes. Use the power of the Bifröst to save the realms from Ragnarök.

name: Precious Stones
description: This is a physics-based platform game where players control a sphere to collect diamonds while avoiding obstacles and hazards. The game requires players to use their knowledge of physics to navigate through levels filled with slopes and moving platforms.

name: Electrician Simulator: Smart Devices
description: Electrician Simulator goes Smart! Complete new "wireless" missions and take your service to the next level. Fix plenty of new smart devices that needs repair and satisfy your clients!

name: Three Kingdoms Origin
description: Three Kingdoms Origin is a multi-player online real-time strategy game based on the Three Kingdoms history which recreates realistic landscapes in the world map. Look out for flank attacks and road blocks from your enemies when you explore the open world and build your city.

name: Land of Zombies
description: World is waiting for you! Save the world from those Zombies. Let's get started...

name: Midnight Witch
description: Your average student life quickly descents into horror as a mysterious witch takes over the college... Can you save the girl you love? Or even make it out alive?

name: Piko Interactive Collection 3
description:
Piko Interactive returns to Evercade with 10 more great games from multiple systems, including cult favourites and previously unreleased titles!

Piko Interactive Collection 3 for Evercade brings together a diverse range of games, including whimsical 32-bit platformer 40 Winks, the technically impressive 16-bit first-person shooter Zero Tolerance, epic 16-bit RPG Legend of Wukong and many more!

Includes:
- 40 Winks (32-bit)
- Legend of Wukong
- Metal Mech: Man & Machine
- Motor City Patrol
- Punch King
- Radikal Bikers (Previously Unreleased)
- Stanley: The Search for Dr. Livingston
- Super Bubble Pop
- Sword of Sodan
- Zero Tolerance

name: Team17 Collection 1
description:
Team17 Collection 1 for Evercade brings together a diverse selection of 16-bit home computer classics first published on Amiga, including the atmospheric sci-fi shooters of the Alien Breed series, the bone-crunching fighting of Body Blows, the accessible sporting action of Arcade Pool and Kingpin, and much more!

Legal Amiga emulation for the first time on a handheld device means that people can take these home computer favourites on the go!

Includes:
- Arcade Pool
- Alien Breed Special Edition ‘92
- Alien Breed 2
- Alien Breed: Tower Assault
- ATR: All Terrain Racing
- Body Blows
- Full Contact
- Kingpin: Arcade Sports Series Bowling
- Project X: Special Edition '93
- Qwak

name: Just Another Life
description: Just Another Life is a narrative-driven "life simulation" visual novel mixed with adventure game puzzle elements. Play as John Doe, a citizen of the town Hope. Help John learn the stories of the various characters of Hope, and help him overcome the hurdles to his own happiness.

name: Big Survivor
description: Survive, with a smile on your face! Fight your way through the scribbles, as you power up and become stronger. Vibe with the tornadoes and get a useless pet. Increase your sucking and suck away!!!!!!?

name: Matricon: Monopoly
description:
Part of the Matrikon city franchise. The story and action takes place in a local casino, buying out all the local gangs, companies and businesses, thereby creating a madness in their hands!

Actions take place in an era of crisis and the collapse of the Matrikon economy!

name: Party Quiz
description: Play a local Quiz game with your friends. Create your own Quiz using the Party Quiz Constructor or use the Steam Workshop to download one of the Quizzes made by the community. Test your knowledge with fun!

name: Zim's Word Game
description: In this fast-paced word game, you build words from falling tiles before your game board fills up. Compete with your friends on the global leaderboards for high scores and longest time played. Always keep an eye out for the Word Of The Day.

name: Galactic Glitch: Prologue
description:
Galactic Glitch is a space-roguelike with fast and physical combat. You fight in bubbles of glitched spacetime, hurling rocks, bouncing foes off walls and destroying your multi-part enemies piece-by-piece in tough-but-fair, souls-inspired combat. Explore, destroy, die, repeat.

The Prologue features two full levels, each with with their own unique enemies and environments, multiple Challenge modes, where players face enemies in arena style combat, as well as three NG+ modes, that each offer new enemies and increased variety of combat encounters.

name: Shattered Heaven
description: Shattered Heaven is a single-player deck builder card game with RPG elements and an ambitious branching narrative, set in a dark fantasy world. The game focuses on a card game and roguelike gameplay fueled by a great replay value, thanks to procedural dungeons, a deep crafting system.

name: Ghost Girl Lasling
description: This is about a talented girl "Lasling" with excellent working ability, became a ghost after an accidental death, and meets the only person in the world who can see and touch her --"Mofft", a story of love and parting.

name: Pogoman
description: Accept the challenge and jump through all the levels, open all the gadgets and especially be careful not to break anything around you.

name: Candle Knight
description: Wield your flame to overcome menacing creatures lurking in the shadows of a ruined castle, use the dynamic difficulty system to your advantage, traverse challenging platforming sections and solve cryptic puzzles inside surreal paintings in this 2.5D action adventure platformer.

name: Reverse: 1999
description:
Reverse: 1999 sets in the retro style world in the west. The story is interesting: on the last day of 1999, humanity was brought into a new age – the 1920s, by a strange storm. In the new world, surprisingly, some talented people have a kind of ability called Arcanum, and some of them become Arcanists. You will explore and try to discover the secrets in the new world.

Now you must find out what to do and save some people along the way. It’s a fantastic card-based game in which you’ll learn a lot of new stuff that RPG fans will undoubtedly enjoy.

name: Decarnation
description: Decarnation is a story rich adventure horror game. Solve cryptic puzzles, fight disturbing enemies, explore a phantasmagorical world of dreams and nightmares, and face the most terrifying monsters from the darkest parts of your soul.

name: The Tartarus Key
description: There’s no way out for Alex Young who wakes up to find herself locked in a strange mansion filled with puzzles, traps, and cameras following her every move. Whether she and her companions live or die, and find the truth behind their abduction, is up to you in this first-person mystery thriller.

name: Mad Games Tycoon 2
description: Start your own game development studio in 1976. Build your own offices, production facilities and server rooms. Develop the games of your dreams and produce the next next-gen console. Rise from a small garage company to a huge corporation.

name: Stasis: Bone Totem
description: Stasis: Bone Totem is a thrilling and spine-tingling journey into the unknown fathoms of the icy ocean and the terrors that await a family. They will uncover a threat far beyond their wildest dreams.

name: Doomblade
description: Deep underground, Gloom Girl discovers Doomblade, a sentient weapon hellbent on escape after eons in chains. Together, “Doom and Gloom” embark on a brutal quest to unlock the powers of The Void and destroy the Dread Lords once and for all in this 2D Action Metroidvania.

name: Deez Shells
description: Sin descripción

name: Ai To Noroi: School Simulator
description: This is a story about 6 girls, very close friends, which were fond of mythical and demonic mysteries. One day they went into an old book store, and found a very old book. Despite it was incredibly expensive, they bought it. Then, one of the girls was chosen to keep the book at home. Serious consequences followed...

name: Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase
description:
Welcome to the world of "Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase" - an exciting arcade race in the style of cyberpunk, where adrenaline and drift are combined with an endless chase from the police. In this exciting game you have to enter a dangerous race for freedom, on the sparkling streets of a neon city.

Get into the driver's seat of a racing car of the future, ready to do anything for the sake of escape. You will have to perform epic drift maneuvers, compete in races on the edge of possibilities, skillfully dodge police patrols and maneuver between obstacles that arise on the way.

With each race, your courage will be tested: the adrenaline chase will begin, where your virtuoso driving and drifting skills will be real tests. You are waiting for an arcade race in the style of cyberpunk, where you will be surrounded by bright neon lights and electronic music will raise the adrenaline to the limit.

The main goal is to escape as far as possible until the police overtake you. The chase will be continuous, and the game will last until your virtuoso driving fails you. Your score will grow with every meter of the way, and you will be able to exchange the points earned for new cars in the store. There is no limit to competitions and chases, and your skill will determine how far you can advance.

"Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase" is a game that will give you adrenaline and tension, remaining in your memory as an exciting experience of arcade racing and skillful drift in the world of cyberpunk. Enter the race, dodge the cops and show your skills in this dynamic game that promises to never stop.

name: Dreamblood
description: An episodic WAD for the 2020 Doom 64 remaster by HeadshotTAS featuring large, dynamic maps and challenging combat. Its first episode received one of the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Mudrock Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Kazdel civilization with its leader Mudrock.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique units (Senior Operator-Mudrock & Mudrock Colossus)
- Unique district (Homeland)
- Unique resource (Stone)
- Increases the amount of natural disasters that happen in the match
- And much more!

name: My Summer Adventure: Memories of Another Life
description: A strange incident turns the life of an ordinary young man upside down when, having fallen asleep on a regular train commute, he wakes up in another country... in a body of a Japanese student! An unforgettable summer adventure awaits, promising many fateful meetings and momentous occasions.

name: Toons Kart
description: Sin descripción

name: Family Chess: Ultra Deluxe
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Senseki Line (Aobadori to Ishinomaki) 205-3100 series
description: The Senseki Line is a 49.0 km long line connecting Sendai City in the central part of Miyagi Prefecture and Ishinomaki City in the northeast, and is the only DC electrified line in the Tohoku region. Like the Saikyo Line, ATACS is used in some sections (Aobadori Station to Higashi Shiogama Station).

name: Sex Simulator: BDSM 2
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high definition graphics and videos, with realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You continue to play the role of an experienced Dom who initiates three curious women into the world of BDSM sex, in this sequel.

name: Hentai World: Foxy Akane
description:
Check the newest appearance of Akane, one of the girls from the main game, in her new foxy look.
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all of the puzzles. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" Foxy Akane. Every success on your part will make her happier!

name: Hentai World: Kitty Rose
description:
Check the newest appearance of Rose, one of the girls from the main game, in her new feline look.
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all of the puzzles. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" Kitty Rose. Every success on your part will make her happier!

name: Hentai World: Puppy Nanami
description:
Check the newest appearance of Nanami, one of the girls from the main game, in her new puppy look.
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all of the puzzles. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" Puppy Nanami. Every success on your part will make her happier!

name: Hentai World: Special Edition
description: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose, and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Decorations Pack 12
description:
It's time to return into the fantastic world of Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys.
Enjoy new decorations in the twelfth official DLC.

name: Akahane Academy
description:
It's back to school after the break!! Your club leader is acting stranger than usual? The teacher is going crazy, and three new boys who are dying to meet you!!

Well, the teacher is always like that... But why is everyone being so weird today?!

These new boys seem to like you...
And by like, I mean it.

name: Astebros
description:
Choose your hero among three different characters and go through procedural dungeons to eliminate your formidable opponents!

Astebros is a roguelite game about the beginnings of the kingdom of Asteborg!
Choose your hero among three different characters and go through procedural dungeons to eliminate your formidable opponents!

Defeat bosses to obtain valuable power orbs!
Collect coins and materials to buy and upgrade your equipment!
Discover mysterious secrets within the dungeons...
All this alone or in pairs!

name: Violet Bricks
description: Violet Bricks is an exciting puzzle game with modern 3D graphics. Help Violet defeat alien robots across dozens of challenging levels and collect power-ups to become stronger. A game that offers modernized nostalgic fun!

name: Finding America: The West
description: Explore the West and uncover its hidden gems through the excitement of finding fun objects.

name: Shop-Like: The Rogue-Like Item Shop Experience
description: An Item-Shop Game meets the concept of roguelikes! Endless Replayability and countless options to victory are awaiting you in Shop-Like! Shop-Like is all about running a business in order to pay your debts, so you will not land in the brutal hands of debt slavery.

name: All is Fair in Love and Vore: The Tavorion Collection
description: Vore visual novel! Vore! Sex! Complex characters! Profound thoughts! Women! Well-researched historical settings! Cannibalism! Never before has it been so easy to play all 6 iconic masterpieces, now with extra content!

name: Gravity
description: Manipulate gravity and deduce the clear conditions! A compact but full-fledged puzzle game with a high level of difficulty!

name: Abstract Driver
description: Abstract Driver is a 1-person game where you have to move inside a cylindrical space. This game is a dynamic action game in which you have to control the camera to the rhythmic music and score points. If you collect a certain number of points, you get achievements.

name: Gathering Our Childhoods
description: The story of the game is about the player traveling back to the childhood campus. Players are required to complete all kinds of tasks, so as to collect the memory points to be able to return to the original world. Let's have a childhood journey together!

name: Sybil is Haunted
description: Sybil has a very scrambled mind. Some days she just needs you to push her along. Help Sybil navigate the horrors of her bedroom and see what adventures await. Find every ending to see what lays in her future. HYIPHYOP

name: Speedway Challenge 2023
description: Speedway Challenge 2023 is a 3D speedway game. Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Super Mega Baseball 4: Ballpark Edition
description: Super Mega Baseball 4 is where the Legends play. The signature mix of arcade-inspired style and immersive gameplay returns with 200+ baseball Legends and a grand slam of presentation upgrades.

name: WhiteClothes
description: WhiteClothes is a RPG in which you play cute monsters on their mission to uphold peace!

name: ArchiHexago
description: ArchiHexago is a casual puzzle game which takes inspiration from match-3 genre and takes it one step further. Each tile type has unique pattern which you need to match in order to gain points. And each level has different tile sets and obstacles to give you a variety of challenges.

name: Truck Mondai
description: " A Kind Girl, or A Ruthless Savior? " A multi-ending action-puzzle game where your guidance becomes a story.

name: Poly Bridge 3
description: The third installment in a series of puzzle-simulation games tasking us with designing and building bridges. Poly Bridge 3 features an expansive campaign, a sandbox mode and custom mod tools support.

name: Shame Legacy
description: Shame Legacy is a first-person survival-horror, set in a forsaken cultist village. You attempt to survive using stealth and escape. By solving puzzles, you unravel the mystery that's h(a)unting you.

name: Disaster Area
description: Disaster Area is a stylized game that includes online combat and campaign mode. In the campaign mode, players will be brought into an unknown disaster. You will fight with your teammates to break out of the encirclement of horrible unknow creatures and explore the source of the disaster.

name: GeneRally 2
description: GeneRally 2 is a top-down arcade racing game with a built-in track editor. Challenge the track records in time-trial; compete on the sofa with friends; or let your creativity flow by creating your very own racing tracks to share with the world!

name: Company of Heroes 3: Console Edition
description: Company of Heroes 3 is the ultimate package of action, tactics and strategy. Take charge in the heat of real-time battle, then command as a General guiding the overall campaign where every decision matters. ​

name: Unboxing
description: An idle game about unboxing and selling items! Optimize and automize your work with drones and relax watching them work while you manage and upgrade new contracts!

name: Friends vs. Friends
description: Friends vs Friends is a frantic, online PvP shooter that combines combat and deck building. Choose a character, build your deck, and test your friendship with the craziest card effects. Fast - Fun - Friends!

name: Super Mega Baseball 4
description: Super Mega Baseball 4 is where the Legends play. The signature combo of arcade-inspired style and immersive gameplay returns with over 200 baseball Legends and a grand slam of presentation upgrades.

name: Dreamlined
description: Dreamlined is a physics-based automation/destruction game about building machines and crushing dreams.

name: To Hell With the Ugly
description: An adventure game about a series of kidnappings, a murderous conspiracy... and being handsome.

name: Farworld Pioneers
description: Farworld Pioneers is a sci-fi, sandbox, colony management game with survival elements and direct NPC control. Establish self-sufficient colonies and fulfill the needs of colonists. Engage in physics based gunplay as you travel the stars. Pilot mechs and vehicles, build bases, and interact with wildlife!

name: Everdream Valley
description: A farming adventure with a dash of magic. By day, restore your quaint homestead into a summer paradise. Raise crops, care for animals and rebuild to your heart's content. At night inhabit the various farmland creatures through your dreams and bring enchantment to the valley.

name: System Shock
description: After 22 years, cyberpunk cult classic System Shock is getting an update. A "reimagined" version of the 1994 Windows PC game is in the works at Night Dive Studios for PC and Xbox One, and it's a project that company founder Stephen Kick says he can hardly believe is really happening.

name: Wonderful Journey
description: Embarking on 'Wonderful Journey' and experiencing different lives, is it a reincarnation encounter? Or is it a reunion of fate?

name: High Stakes
description:
A Halloween party gone wrong; one of the attendees ends up staked in the heart with a witch's broomstick. Who could have done such a thing?

Listen to suspect's stories and view the case photos to find the truth behind what happened that night. Not everything you hear may be the truth, however.

name: Heart of Atlantis
description: Since you were young, you’ve always felt as if something was calling you to the sea. Now, as an oceanography student, you come across the discovery of a lifetime with your dark and broodingly handsome professor—the sunken city of Atlantis. But your field study takes an unexpected turn when your submarine crashes and you wake in the arms of a beautiful merman, who’s the crown prince of the lost kingdom.

name: Romace
description:
A visual novel with a diverse cast of characters from various ethnicities, exploring romance and relationships through an asexual lens.

This is an ongoing collaborative project created to showcase some aspects of the ace experience, by a team of three ace students for their honours year at university, There are multiple paths and endings, including platonic endings, available within our prototype!

name: Oni no Yakata
description: Oni No Yakata ("Mansion of the Oni") is a retelling of the Ao Oni story, told from the perspective of a new cast with familiar, yet original maps and locations, and a different narrative. You play as Ayana Hasegawa, an eighteen year old Japanese high school student in the last month of her school career. As one last fun adventure with her friends, they plan a trip to an allegedly haunted mansion on the outskirts of town. Little do they know, things wouldn't turn out as they had planned.

name: Lost Bits
description:
Lost Bits is a 2.5D retro platformer where you join M1L0 on his quest for the Great Legume.

Help M1L0 play through some old PC games on his quest to find the Great Legume!
lost bits is a 2.5D action platformer with charming graphics and a retro aesthetic. Explore a sunken battleship, grapple through a construction site, and fight the computer's operating system in this short game

name: Maple Winters in Leafbud Rampage!!
description: An action roguelite horde survival game about Maple Winters.

name: Dinogen Online: Commando Bundle
description: Commando Bundle with 15 Shards, 3 Weapons, and 6 Character Items!

name: Love and Demons
description:
Love and Demons is an hilarious Isekai Parody Visual Novel game where you control the fate of Maximillian, a young and naive prince who accidentally enters a portal and finds himself in a mysterious and dangerous demon realm.
In Love and Demons, you play as Maximillian, a charming but clueless prince who quickly becomes the object of desire for the demon realm's most beautiful girls. Keep an eye on your level of coverage and carefully choose your responses, or your disguise will disappear.

Made with a custom engine in Love and Demons you can choose your own path, make decisions that will impact the story, and watch as your choices lead to different outcomes and endings.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter hilarious scenes, absurd puzzles, wild romance, some bugs, and a lot of bad endings.

Will you choose to fight your way through the demon realm or win the hearts of the girls who cross your path? The choice is yours.

name: Mechanism
description: Late into the night, the bear animatronic awakes from the stench of suspicious activity.. what will he find?

name: Run Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Blockade
description: Blockade is a desktop puzzle game that takes a different approach towards the match-3 strategic puzzle solving genre.

name: FightBit
description: FightBit is a side-scrolling beat-em-up with pseudo 8-bit graphics and rudimentary gameplay influenced by contemporary melee focused combat games.

name: War For Galaxy
description: Become the ruler of the entire Galaxy: colonize planets, extract resources, build defenses and fight in planetary battles!

name: The Malice Kingdom
description: Explore an ancient world in The Malice Kingdom. Travel the rich and diverse landscape filled with ancient ruins, foreboding forests, and haunting mansions. Discover powerful weapons, befriend Whimsical characters, and uncover the dormant secret within the kingdom.

name: The Paradixion: Son's Room
description: The Paraxition: Son's Room is the first series of The Paraxition, a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere developed by a solo developer in Korea.

name: Elizord's Tale
description: This is a first-person horror game with jumpscares that tells the tale of the character Elizord who gained a power to take revenge on everyone who mocked him in his kingdom.

name: Tornado: Research and Rescue
description: Get ready for non-stop action with Tornado: Research and Rescue! Chase down violent tornadoes using 90's style doppler radar, deploy scientific probes, and earn money to upgrade your equipment. Enjoy a unique experience with procedurally generated tornadoes and scenarios!

name: 98xx
description: The 98xx software was dug up with only a few working files remaining. You must navigate through each item and see what they do. Perhaps something might happen.

name: Horror Amusement Park
description: "Horror Amusement Park" is a thrilling game that puts you in charge of creating your very own horror-themed amusement park.

name: The Squeal of the Pig
description: The CEO of the biggest meat producing corporation is kidnapped by a cannibalistic serial killer that exclusively eats human flesh. The former fears being eaten, but the latter assures him he has other plans for him, including a special surprise.

name: Chris: The Element Runner
description: In Chris: The Element Runner, race through an endless 2D stage filled with elemental particles as you dodge stones, flames, water, and air. Simple graphics and gameplay make it easy to pick up and play for quick sessions. Test your skills and see how far you can survive in this thrilling adventure.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Malaysia
description: Puzzles of Malaysia!

name: ASZG Project
description: ASZG is a first-person shooter game with elements of horror, in which you must survive the creatures generated by the harmful DK-19 virus. Explore and survive in a completely devastated, apocalyptic environment, encountering increasingly greater challenges as you progress through this atypical story.

name: Train Operator 377
description: Enjoy the charm of one of the UK’s oldest and most enchanting railways from the best available viewpoint – the driver’s seat! Hammer through urban sprawl, rolling fields and famous tunnels at 90 MPH in all weathers and at any time of your choosing.

name: Rerun
description: Rerun is a turn-based tactical rougelike where you must use thoughtful positioning and resource management in order to be victorious. Strategically plan your adventurers' randomly generated upgrade path as you progress through a dungeon that changes each run.

name: The Riftbreaker: World Expansion II
description: Explore an entirely new area of Galatea 37 in this Story Campaign expansion for The Riftbreaker. Catalog new species. Craft new and unique weapons. Fight hordes of aliens, unlike anything you've seen before.

name: Magical Fairy Force: Champion Edition
description: A competitive top-down shooter inspired by 90s arcade games, Magical Fairy Force - Champion Edition is an exciting, action-packed follow-up to 2020's Atari 5200 original. Choose from one of 16 characters and fly into battle against the computer opponent or up to three friends.

name: Radiant Cell
description: What do you do when you're locked inside a video game with a crazed AI and some guns? You F*CKING run and kill...That's what you do! in the world of radiant cell, get ready to defend yourself as you wall run, shoot, slow down time, and of course grapple.

name: Travel the Words
description: Immersive word puzzles, engaging, educational fun! - Includes fun facts, word shuffling and a mini-game when you find bonus words :)

name: Lost Bits
description: Lost Bits is an abstract precision platformer, where your goal is to collect all the small cubes and avoid different obstacles. If you touch any obstacle your hero will decay into bits and you will start over again. Guide the cube through the deadly obstacles and collect all the lost bits.

name: Return
description: An art driven souls-lite game set in the rebirth of your home planet. Return home, explore the mutated landscapes, slash, roll, and shoot your way through enemies. Find parts to repair your ship and collect resources. Purchase items and equipment from merchants to fight ancient bosses.

name: Closed Faith
description:
Closed Faith is a freeware Strategy RPG made by Segawa. It was released the 28th of May 2023.

After being sealed away for 200 years, the God of Wisdom, Abyssliese, wakes up. They meet their loyal and only remaining priest, Theseus.

The reason why Abyssliese and many other gods were sealed away was because of a recent god named Tinirese. With his powers, he made himself the only god to be believed in.

Wanting to stop him, Abyssliese will try to get out of their temple with Theseus, but it will be a long and difficult task, even with the help of the many characters the duo will come across.

name: Heartburn
description: Go on a date with your favorite streamer Serze and take a look at the lovely cafe you're at!

name: PETSCII Bros
description: This Commodore PET game has similar game mechanics to the original Mario Bros arcade game. Hit the floor under the turtles to flip them, and jump up to kick them. A one or two player action game made for the TOJam 2023 game jam.

name: Slendytubbies: Worlds
description: Slendytubbies: Worlds is the sixth and last game of the Slendytubbies series developed by ZeoWorks.

name: Girlkiller
description:
There is a girl who looks like you. Today is the day you're going to kill her.

An illustrated erotic queer horror IF about being trans, among other things.

name: Mooshie's Kitchen 3
description: Mooshie has returned once more in the finale of the Mooshie's Kitchen trilogy. This time, he's the President of the United States!

name: Skibidi War: Toilets Attack
description: A war between the Skibidi Toilets and the camera heads has broken out. Defend against the relentless onslaught of Skibidi toilets in this epic war.

name: Underverse Battles
description: Underverse Battles is a multiplayer turn-based fighting game using the Undertale mechanics. Select your character and fight against other players. Dodge enemy attacks, choose your attacks carefully and win the fight.

name: Yunoia
description: Iris, a light spirit, tends to the color of her world with a prismatic mask. One day, darkness envelops the skies and it begins to vacuum away the colors of her beloved Eden. Set out on a journey together to restore this world by dispersing the iridescence that can be found within.

name: Ballooni
description: Happiness has a name: Ballooni! Just play Ballooni and have fun!

name: The Motorcycle
description: Horror game about motorcycle that is chasing you :)

name: Bakeborough
description: In Bakeborough, a Bakery RPG, you can take out your eye to see less.

name: Road Defense: Outsiders
description: Protect vehicles on the road and survive! Road Defense: Outsiders is a game that combines elements of the 'roguelike' and 'tower defense' genres. Upgrade the towers and your own skills to be able to annihilate all the life around you!

name: Kill the Man in the House
description: A short, visceral first-person shooter about killing a man in a house.

name: Super Hero Demolition
description:
Demolish everything!
Use superhero powers to demolish block structures!
Upgrade your powers until you are strong enough to demolish it all!
each hero has different powers, which hero are you?

name: Hentai Girls
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Paper Dominoes
description: Get ready to dominate the dominoes in Paper Dominoes - the addictive game that's perfect for all ages! The classic game right in your hands with a beautiful art style.

name: Pokémon Yellow: Cramorant Edition
description: A ROM hack of Pokemon Yellow which replaces Pikachu with Cramorant! Many other major and minor changes have been made to create a new Pokemon Yellow experience. This project aims to provide a different way to enjoy Yellow while adding more variety to the game, all while staying mostly true to the Pokemon Generation 1 experience. This hack was created using the Pokemon Yellow disassembly as a base.

name: Sinking Iron
description:
A strong submarine earthquake caught the attention of an amateur diver and his apprentice.

They were close by when the incident happened and decided to investigate before officials arrived.

You are the apprentice. Good luck.

name: Indemon Tales
description: Earn the respect of a guild full of monsters and demons as a lone human by taking part in dangerous dungeon adventures and uncover secrets behind the mysterious demon kingdom of Tarborea.

name: Demoniac Words
description: The evil has taken everything from two sorrowful girls, but the girls will not stop fighting, they will not stop resisting. They are not fighting for themselves.

name: Need for Drifting
description: "Need for Drifting" is an adrenaline-fueled game that is perfect for anyone who loves the thrill of drifting and the excitement of competition.

name: Kirin Come
description: Kirin Come is a Sci-fi comedy Visual Novel. Help Rachel Reid and her charming partner Mary find their happiness somewhere among the cold vacuum of space!

name: Spiral Dystopia
description: Kou, the descendant of a family that manages a deserted shrine, meets a mysterious woman called Miyu who wanders the streets at night with a bamboo sword. When Kou and Miyu discover the ancient book that Miyu is searching for, lightning strikes and the world begins to spiral.

name: Home Sweet Home
description: A sweet game about wandering around a neighborhood and making friends

name: Dancing Cats
description: In Dancing Cats, you can enjoy super amazing and beautiful ""Cat Music""——a mix of cute ""meowing"" sound and pop music. You can experience wonderful feelings beyond your imagination with a perfect blend of beat and music. You can also experience various song styles including both global hit songs and your favorite independent music.

name: MasterChef: The Official Video Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 08
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 2 Episode 8: When Mini was There. Mini spirals after scrambling home with broken wings. She calls Rhyme in an attempt to soothe herself. Meanwhile Cody and his friends pack up.

name: Oh My Cod!!: We Mer-Made For Each Other!
description:
Elise, an introverted marine biology student wins a 3 month trip to Papua New Guinea to study the Coral Sea! However, upon her first expedition, she meets a mermaid caught in plastic in the waters who offers to teach her all about life deep under the surface from a first-hand-resident. Elise eagerly takes this opportunity to learn, and the opportunity to talk to a charming girl her age!

She might be sacrificing facts for fondness because her source unfortunately isn’t very reliable…

name: Seashell Thief
description: An apathetic princess has to get back the heirloom her younger sister stole.

name: Boobsle
description: Embark on a captivating journey with Boobsle! Solve stunning anime puzzles, meet charming characters, and immerse in breathtaking art. Experience the beauty as you unlock secrets within each puzzle. Delight in gorgeous art and captivating characters. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure!

name: The Silent Neighbor
description: In the neighborhood you step into, everyone has their secrets... But only your silent neighbor's is deadly. "The Silent Neighbor" is an immersive horror game that combines mystery and suspense. In the depths of a house filled with hidden passages, puzzles, and unexpected perils, you will uncover the dark secrets of your neighbor and strive to stay alive. Solve mind-bending puzzles, navigate through terrifying moments, and dare to confront the cursed past of your silent neighbor. Silence can be deceiving. It is time to face a silent threat in the darkness.

name: Deep Breath
description:
Deep Breath - a short mapset at the bottom of the ocean.

In this project, our little green hero steps through the entryway airlock of an underwater base, the H.A.D.E.S (Hydro Atomic Deepsea Experimental Science) Facility, to find that demons are running rampant. Our mission: get to the heart of the Facility and activate the self-destruct protocol. Hopefully Doomguy can make it out alive, or at least sink down to a watery grave with all the monsters.

Greatly inspired by AD_79's map 05 from Tetanus by Squonker Team - the ingenious mechanics and visuals used in that map made me think of other potential ways in which to continue that narrative and visual thread.

name: Neon Fantasy: Furries
description: Neon Fantasy: Furries is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Jet Dragon
description:
JET DRAGON is a "Race Dragon Nurturing Simulation". Manage your team, train dragons and riders, and win races with unique strategies!

Step through space and time into the world of Venerusa, where dragon racers soar the skies.

name: PI.EXE Enhanced Edition
description: PI.EXE is a challenging action/platformer that takes place in the inside of an operative system's server! PI.EXE Enhanced Edition is an upgraded version of the game incluiding numeroues improvements:

name: Angel Legion: Lil Lily - Green
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: The Little Mermaid's Friend
description: There are two mermaids who want to decide who will be the best mermaid. Although they often fight, in the end they make up and their friendship is the most important thing.

name: Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Offline
description: The V2 expansion from Dragon Quest X Online remade as DLC for Dragon Quest X Offline

name: FPVSIM FPV Simulator
description: FPVSIM is an FPV simulator that is designed & tuned for high consistency with research level quadrotor dynamics simulation engine.

name: Solasta: Lightbringers Edition
description:
The Solasta Lightbringers Edition contains:
- Crown of the Magister: The original level 1-12 campaign. From fledgling adventurers to saviours of Masgarth, this 40h+ campaign will take you through the Badlands in search of ancient artifacts to stand against a mysterious threat.
- Palace of Ice: A level 10-16 campaign, it is the continuation of Crown of the Magister and Solasta's last DLC. Venture north into the lands of the Snow Alliance to help your allies and end the Sorak menace once and for all! Also unlocks the Gnome and Tiefling ancestries.
- Lost Valley: A stand-alone level 1-12 campaign. Trapped by accident in an isolated valley where Manacalon's ancient traditions still rule, the party must find a way to escape by allying various factions jumping at each other's throat. Also unlocks an additional subclass for each class.

name: The Wonderful 101: Remastered - The Wonderful One: After School Hero - Part 2
description:
Get ready for a unique side-scrolling experience in the world of The Wonderful 101: Remastered! This free DLC lets you enjoy a brand new episode in which you experience Luka's story!

In Part 2 of this DLC, don't miss some brand new mode including a Caravan Mode and Online Rankings.

name: Moto Rush GT + Food Truck Tycoon
description: Embrace the thrill of high-octane racing and culinary mastery with the exhilarating Moto Rush GT + Food Truck Tycoon Bundle!

name: Simulator Pack: Gas Station Simulator and Treasure Hunter Simulator
description:
Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game.

Dive into the exciting world of finding long forgotten treasures. Grab your metal detector and set off to explore the countryside. What today looks like a peaceful meadow might have been the scene of a fierce battle in the past, hiding now the valuable artefacts. Ready to dig in the past?

name: Battlefield 2042: Elite Edition
description: Packed to the brim with value, Battlefield 2042 Elite Edition brings 4 Seasons worth of content. Battle on 17+ maps, wield over 35 weapons, deploy as 14 Specialists, and enjoy the “Lost World” Epic Bundle.

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Knights & Guns
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure filled with culinary delights and medieval action with the Food Truck Tycoon + Knights and Guns Bundle!

name: Tochi T.U.N.R
description: A remake of an Action-Adventure game for the Playdate!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Firepower Pack
description: The Firepower pack brings 10 new units to the battlefields of Gladius Prime! The new units will bring overwhelming firepower and will increase the strategic options available to all commanders.

name: Super Virus Defense
description: Fight the virus in this fast paced arcade shooter with a dash of tower defense!

name: Phonk Cats
description: Play the dynamic rhythm game to the best phonk tracks! Play solo or versus your friend, customize your cats, choose different game modes - Phonk Cats are waiting for you!

name: Nyan-Nyan Punch!
description: Sin descripción

name: Sex Simulator: BDSM Girls
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high definition graphics and videos, with realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of an experienced Mistress who initiates three lucky women into the world of BDSM sex.

name: The Pit
description: Fight extremely challenging bosses by dodging their every attack and landing powerful combos. In a game that tests your reaction speed while making you feel untouchable.

name: Heroes of Spyria
description: A JRPG style fantasy game reminiscent of SNES classics.

name: Survivor's End
description: Grab your guns and get ready to take on the zombie apocalypse like never before!

name: How Many Deaths to Clear?
description: "How many deaths to clear?" is a time attack game where you compete to clear the game as quickly as possible while keeping your death count as low as possible. Try to clear the game as fast as you can without dying too much, and enjoy the thrilling sensation that comes with it.

name: Quick Thief
description: Quick Thief is the simplest 2D game in which you have to steal things and sell them and try not to get in the eyes of the guards.

name: Spellarium
description: That's the first game in the successful Spellarium series. It has Solitaire, Spot the Difference levels in addition to the Match 3 levels, plus a beautiful location to build.

name: Dice Legacy: Definitive Edition
description:
Roll and use your dice to gather resources, construct buildings, expand your settlement and face the menacing threats of a mysterious ringworld.

Dice Legacy Definitive Edition includes all the content from the original Dice Legacy release plus the three major updates.

name: Date with Foxgirl
description: Have you ever wondered why you don't have a girlfriend? Or have you ever wondered if you will ever find a girlfriend? Sometimes it doesn't take much to meet a beautiful foxy girl... Just go to a cafe for coffee in time, and have a little perseverance and desire...

name: Crazy The Clown's Balloon Animal Massacre
description: Crazy told them all, more than once. He told them *not* to setup a balloon animal factory at the circus... but no...nobody would listen. Within days the equipment went out of control due to AI software attempting to take over the world and the Circus became an immediate disaster.

name: The Two Moons
description: A Comedy/Walking Simulator RPG that follows a 4th-wall breaking main character who knows he is in a crappy RPG maker game and wants no part of it, but he is forced into being the main character by a series of infinite loop Yes/No choices where No isn't a real option. Chaos ensues in this wacky game.

name: Root Connections
description: Digging deep into the root of his world, you play as the hallucinations of a man struggling with psychotic depression. Puzzling your way through the darkness of alcoholism and the fear of losing loved ones, it is up to you to root connect this man’s life back together again!

name: Noitapeli
description: First person horror game, you have a special watch in your hand which shows the distance to the noita. Find a bottle which noita needs and bring it back. Use gun, collect mushrooms and avoid noita to find the bottle.

name: Hexagon Survivors
description: Is a game that is not for the faint of heart. With its challenging difficulty level, players will need to be on their toes at all times. Those who are up for the challenge, Hexagon Survivors offers a thrilling, cyberpunk-inspired adventure that is sure to keep players engaged for hours on end.

name: Byakuya Museum
description: “I should have...died...”Opened eyes again, he found himself in a bustling museum!Players need to take on the role of a raven specimen boy "Gregorio" to explore the Byakuya Museum. Your mission is to plumb the secrets of Time Town, uncover your own past, and escape from the museum.

name: Kortstrid
description: Kortstrid: a captivating TCG in a vast fantasy world. Battle with unique heroes, foes, and companions in strategic, ever-evolving gameplay. Dive into an enthralling adventure filled with camaraderie!

name: Atomgrad
description: A linguistic detective game. Decrypt the Soviet computer to prevent total nuclear annihilation.

name: Hard Minus Forever Standalone DLC
description: Hard Minus is coming back, if you hadn't enough adrenaline action in your gaming life.

name: House Party: Detective Liz Katz in a Gritty Kitty Murder Mystery
description:
Your favorite house party flirts with a bit of blood and darkness in its second-ever guest expansion pack — featuring famous cosplayer, streamer, actress, and model Liz Katz!

Enjoy a thrilling new branching Original Story addition focused around and fully voice-acted by Liz Katz herself! Be prepared for the lights to go out, fear to reign, and unsolved mysteries to come to light in this wild new comedy-noir DLC!

name: Zoid Zoid Tetsoidea
description: Zoid Zoid Tetsoidea is a recreation of "Defenders of Tetsoidea", with new and improved visuals. Join Leira and Tens as they fight against a corporation intent on destroying the world by making a commodity out of the sacred "fateholder crystals".

name: Town of Salem 2
description:
Town of Salem 2 is the sequel to BlankMediaGames' hit Murder Mystery game, Town of Salem. With a revitalized 3d world, new and reworked roles, improved chat features and much more you can't help but join the Witch Hunt!

Town of Salem 2 pits the Town vs the Coven, Serial Killers, Arsonist, Werewolves, and even the Horsemen of the Apocalypse themselves. Can you survive the Town of Salem again? Use your wits, abilities of deduction, and your role's special abilities to help, or hurt, the Town and lead your side to victory!

name: Otoko Cross: Naked Remix
description: The Naked Remix is a bundle that includes Pretty Boys Klondike Solitaire + Pretty Boys Mahjong Solitaire!

name: Fantasy Love
description: Fantasy Love - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Grimm of the Dome
description: In this last city of mankind, an isolated paradise in the ocean, your choices and dices will lead it to Utopia or Distopia. You will help the magistrate AI to investigate the AI-worship religious group, illicit drugs, those who were resurrected, and those who are neither android nor mankind…

name: Tenders Fight
description: Tenders Fight is a thrilling fighting game where you go up against a horde of aggressive chicken aliens. You play as a boxer, using your skills to defeat these cunning creatures. With each level, the chickens become stronger and smarter, testing your abilities to their limits. Can you defeat them?

name: Forspoken: In Tanta We Trust
description: Continuing her search for a way to eradicate the Break from Athia once and for all, Frey finds herself following a mysterious voice that leads her to a place that somehow transports her to the Purge of the Rheddig, the legendary battle that devastated Athia and eventually drove the Tantas to madness.

name: The Button by Elendow
description:
Every time you press the button you get 1 point.

Every time you press the button your odds to lose all your points increases by 1%.

Good luck.

name: Dominator Idle
description: Dominator Idle is the ultimate idle game for world domination. Train troops and purchase magical upgrades in order to takeover the entirety of earth. With a powerful prestige system you can grow your power to unfathomable standards allowing to your conquer stronger versions of Earth.

name: Araka: JK Exorcist Horror RPG
