description: Manipulate the main character with power of telepathic, looking for the trace of Araka, an Exorcist imprisoned in the other world.

name: Quantum Gravity: Campaign
description: Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell platformer. The game's main mechanic is inverting gravity to hover through space. Including long-range fights but also melees fighting. The Campaign mode features many unique and special levels to complete.

name: Mystical Mixing
description: Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.

name: Locomotorica: Staggering Ragdoll
description: You are a machine learning model tasked with driving an active ragdoll in a computer physics simulation. Take manual control of your feet to retain balance, walk, navigate obstacles, and perform various tasks. A challenging game partially inspired by Bennett Foddy's work.

name: Indoor Kickball
description: Indoor Kickball is fast paced 1v1 game of kickball played where your parents wouldn't let you. Destroy the living room, kitchen, bedroom, basement, and many other rooms of the house with a chaotic game of kickball.

name: The Shape of Things
description: Experience a relaxing atmosphere from the comfort of your cozy room by solving small 3D puzzles inside collectible gachapons, and find the original shape of things inspired by Rubik’s style.

name: Project Romboid
description: Project Romboid is a hard, arcade shooter roguelite in which you will have to pick and combine items so that you can survive waves of enemies that will chase you and shoot at you. New items will appear every level. Combine them to create powerful builds that will help you survive.

name: Skye Tales
description: A gentle puzzle-exploration game set in a world that couldn’t be happier to see you.

name: Formula Bwoah
description: Formula Bwoah is a strategic arcade top down motorsport racing game where you not only drive the car, but also plan and react to dynamic racing events like changing weather, track conditions, tire degradation, etc.

name: Party Bots
description: Party Bots is an online party game for up to 100 players. Survive on your platform in a chaotic arena and be the last bot standing!

name: Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath
description: Chronicles of 2 Heroes is an intense 16-bit action platformer with Metroidvania elements and a singular mechanic: you can switch in real-time between the two main characters! The Samurai and the Kunoichi have unique, surprising combat styles that you will need to master to save feudal Japan from the goddess Amaterasu and her fearsome minions.

name: Hijack Overdrive
description: Hijack Overdrive is a fast-paced action game where you steal enemy vehicles mid-combat to fight back. Jump from gunship to gunship in order to pilot your makeshift fleet through the enemy forces. It's a unique genre-mix of Platformer, Shootemup, and a bit of Towerdefense.

name: Black Academy
description: 'School life like hell... Actually, it’s a school run by the devil?!’ Black Academy combines Side-scrolling shooting and Rogue-lite with storyline of students transforming into magical girls to confront demons after finding out the real identity of the Academy.

name: OrbWars
description: OrbWars is a fast paced, action oriented party game featuring easy to learn high intensity gameplay. Featuring seamless local and online multiplayer, there's nothing to stop you from fighting with or versus your friends in up to 4 player matches or experiencing the cooperative story campaign.

name: Pizza Rush Race: Fighting Boss
description:
Pizza boss - Peppino is very angry, rushing to fight with Tomato but encountering a maze of trouble, are you smart enough to solve this situation?

In the Pizza Town Race, you need to help Pepperman, Peppino... find Tomata of the same color in the shortest time, before the Pizza boss's anger erupts. Challenges, obstacles, obstacles will constantly appear to challenge your imagination and puzzle ability.

name: Fight Legends
description: RPG combat arena with bloody medieval sword fights for honor and shadow bounty

name: Lajoy Teckna
description: What lurks in the dark? Survive a shift at the worn-down Rotwheel family storage facility against a slew of murderous cyborgs and hardware malfunctions. Survive the shift and earn your freedom!

name: American Truck Simulator: Volvo VNL
description: Reliability, performance, and absolute driver satisfaction. This is why the Volvo VNL is an embodiment of excellence in the trucking world, and we are excited to let you know that brand new models have arrived in American Truck Simulator as a free update!

name: HandyGames Deluxe Pack
description: A set of 3 unique games presented by Handy Games! Voice-operated puzzle action game "One Hand Clapping", side-scrolling action game "Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Ultimate Edition" in which you explore a world full of gimmicks, and cute cardboard puzzle "Pile Up! Box by Box". Can be enjoyed by children and adults alike. Let's go on a big adventure by operating pop characters on colorful stages!

name: Super Kids Racing: Lava Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hell Let Loose: Cavalry Coat
description:
This DLC contains:
Cavalry Coat - stained with grease and grime from the heavy machinery, this well-insulated mix of suede and sheep's wool kept the Soviet tank crews warm to help them survive and battle through the relentless winter weather.
(Available for the Soviet Tank Commander and Crewman)

name: Anna Girl
description: This is a casual jigsaw puzzle game, the game contains 28 sexy pictures. In the puzzle at the same time, accompanied by relaxing music, you can unconsciously view the sexy picture content.

name: Generation Zero: Tactical Equipment Pack 2
description: Take your guerilla operations to the next level with our second Tactical Equipment DLC! Using scavenged parts and tech, the Resistance have crafted five new items to distract, disrupt, hack, and blow up your enemies!

name: SMB RMX Land
description: One Day In Sarasaland, Mario (Or Whoever You Are Playing As) is running through the desert and Encounters Thicc Boi Who Is Wielding The Phantom Ruby. The Hero Gets Teleported Away To Another Part Of The Desert And Meets A Wiggler Named Harold And A Snorpler Named Gerald. The Two Siblings Are Trying To Stop Thicc Boi From Destroying The Fabric Of Reality. The Hero And The Two Worm Brothers Set Out Two Stop Thicc Boi Before It Is Too Late...

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack
description: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters, as well as the 9 characters from Season Pass 1 and Season Pass 2, for a total of 24 characters. There are 2 colors for every character, making for 48 extra colors available.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Appreciation Color Pack
description: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters, as well as the 9 characters from Season Pass 1 and Season Pass 2, for a total of 24 characters. There is 1 color for every character, making for 24 extra colors available.

name: Idle Dragon Clicker: Expansion Pack 1
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Wavecade: Ships Pack
description: Play Wavecade with a selection of 10 NEW ships! Customize your player with any color and show off your skills... in style!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Tír na nÓg
description: The additional battle stage "Tír na nÓg" becomes selectable in-game.

name: MX vs. ATV Legends: 2023 AMA Pro Motocross Championship
description: Compete like the pros on 12 official tracks from the 2023 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, including the legendary Loretta Lynn’s!

name: Voice: Legacy of Hale
description: Who will inherit the Hale family legacy?

name: One Piece Odyssey: Reunion of Memories
description: Come join the Straw Hats for a new and different way to experience One Piece Odyssey. One Piece Odyssey, Reunion of Memories is available in the Deluxe version of the game, and purchasable separately. Expansion content is available after players finish the main game. One Piece Odyssey is available for PlayStation4, PlayStation5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.

name: Memoryland Prelude
description: Trapped in a world of memories, you must retrace the past after a glitch in the simulation threw everything into chaos. Discover cards that can summon strange creatures and fight to unravel the mysteries of Memoryland. Memoryland Prelude is a dreamlike card based JRPG, and is the first chapter in the Memoryland series.

name: Everslaught Invasion
description: Get ready for the ultimate VR action game with Everslaught Invasion! Choose from three unique classes, then team up with a friend online to take on hordes of enemies and defeat the Great Corruption. Run, dash, jump, and grapple your way through large dark fantasy environments.

name: New Master Quest
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time that includes new dungeons.

name: SnowRunner: The Mastodon
description: Expand your vehicle collection with The Mastodon DLC to receive the ZikZ 612H "Mastodon", a super-large, super-heavy beast of a truck with 3 built-in trailer slots! The Mastodon DLC is not included in the Year 1, Year 2 or Year 3 Pass.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Cthulhu Mythos 2
description: Feel the cold breath of Cthulhu! Explore the worlds of Lovecraft, collect all the special cards!

name: Princess Arthur for Nintendo Switch
description:
Port of Princess Arthur for the Nintendo Switch.

A king has left the world. In this country where for generations the king has been decided by the Holy Sword, a ceremony would be held to select the new king. Out of the many people who sought to draw the Sword, only one succeeded. Neither a knight nor royalty, the person was an ordinary girl.

Persuaded by the legendary magician Merlin, the girl begins to live as the king without understanding anything. It is there that she meets the Knights of the Round Table. The girl stands on a battlefield for the first time in her life. She grips the Sword tightly in hand, still not knowing why it chose her. Tears are in her eyes.

The girl learns what love truly is. Even as several threads of fate entwine around and trifle with her, she will continue to love only one. And so, the girl takes the sword in her hand. To cut open fate for the one she loves.

name: The Case of the Golden Idol: Spider of Lanka Bundle
description:
Discover clues surrounding 12 strange and gruesome deaths and build your own theory. Pick your suspect, deduce the motive, unmask the awful truth.

Step into the shoes of an 18th century detective and uncover the mystery behind twelve strange deaths spanning 50 years, all somehow connected. Unmask the true killers in this sprawling narrative and discover their devious motives.

Featuring a brand new expansion
Set in the fictional Kingdom of Lanka, this DLC offers three brand new scenarios that will demand the utmost of your deduction powers to unravel.

Encounter characters old and new during your expedition to Lanka. Among these faces hides the Spider of Lanka, puppeteering events to shape the future

name: Crimen: Mercenary Tales
description:
Raise yer glasses high, me hearties! Embark on a (bloody!) journey through eight swashbucklin' tales of grandeur, riches, and legendary feats!

Slash your way through eerie castles, ancient temples, forsaken shipwrecks, and other astonishing locations while wielding a variety of historically accurate weapons directly from the 17th-century.

Experience visually captivating comic book graphics, while being entertained by the mercenary humor of the tavern’s patrons and their over-the-top achievements.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Update 3.1
description:
In this update you get:
- A new Legendary Hero
- Bretonnia are getting some love with plenty of changes and rebalances.
- The Great Drill of Hashut will strike in a new Chaos Dwarf endgame crisis for Immortal Empires, The Will of Hashut.
- Beef up the lower tiers of infantry with the fourth Regiments of Renown

name: Cassette Beasts: Deluxe Edition
description: This edition contains everything you need for the complete Cassette Beasts experience. Set out to explore the world of New Wirral with max expression, unique apparel, and accessories in the Cosplay Pack!

name: The Jackbox Party Trilogy 3.0
description: Take your family get-together or work happy hour to the next level with The Jackbox Party Trilogy 3.0! This collection features all 15 hit games from Party Packs 7, 8, and 9. The best part? Your phone is your controller, so everyone can play - no special equipment required!

name: World War: Combat Guardian
description: Part 2 of a Reality single play FPS game set in World War II! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons! Team up with our soldiers to complete the battlefield mission!

name: Slasher
description: Welcome to an epic adventure like no other. Slasher - a game that promises non-stop action, adventure and excitement! In this game, you play as a fierce and powerful female character, ready to take on the world and all its challenges.

name: Need for Drive: Car Racing
description: "Need for Drive” is a thrilling racing game that will put your driving skills to the test. In this game, you will have access to various game modes, including drag, sprint, time trial, and racing.

name: Racing Drift Taxi Car Simulator Ultimate
description: Skillful driving in the city is a very important skill for a taxi driver.

name: Laser Brain Puzzle: Classic Logic Arcade
description: A classic puzzle game where you have to move reflective blocks to point the laser in the right direction!

name: Super Long Boy
description: Super Long Boy is an arcade mobile game where you play as Super Long who's continuously growing up. Your goal is to get the higher score without hitting a wall.

name: Forklift 2024: The Simulation
description: Get ready to take on the ultimate forklift simulation experience with Forklift 2024 - The Simulation! Operate your very own forklift and complete randomly generated orders to earn money and expand your warehouse. With a variety of goods to handle and increasing complexity as you progress, this game will keep you on your toes!

name: Octo Curse
description: A pirate turned into octopus. Can you break the curse?

name: Railway Empire 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Railway Empire 2 game, the original soundtrack, exclusive skins for each of the three sizes of your railway stations, an exclusive skin for your company HQ, and an exclusive skin for two locomotives.

name: Arcade Archives: Rolling Thunder 2
description:
"ROLLING THUNDER 2" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1990.
Operate the hero of the Special Operations Forces and destroy the secret organization "NEOGELDRA" that plans to conquer the world.
In this work, you can control not only the main character "ALBATROSS", but also "LEILA BLITZ", who was captured in the previous game, on the 2P side.

name: Alone in the Dark Prologue: Grace in the Dark
description: Grace in the Dark is a free-to-play prelude to Alone in the Dark, a reboot of a horror classic. It gives players their first glimpse into the story of Alone in the Dark and helps set the atmosphere, which is expected to be a more linear experience with some exploration and basic puzzles. Grace in the Dark will provide about 15-20 minutes of gameplay but will not feature any combat.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Orks
description: The most warlike race in the Galaxy, Orks live for the joy of battle and are always chasing their next big Waaagh! They arrive in Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector with fifteen super-killy units that are all armed to da teef and overflowing with Dakka!

name: Ghost Maze
description: Embark on this small adventure to conquer a treasure guarded by an iconic character from old games. Find keys to unlock secret passages, face enemies, and explore a labyrinth to discover the game's secrets. Get ready for an epic journey to become the hero who claims the wealth.

name: Golf with the Lads
description: A short project aimed at bringing a fun minigolf experience to VR for free!

name: Horse Club Adventures: Lakeside Collection
description: Saddled, up and away! Ride together with the girls from Horse Club and discover a colorful world full of adventure and experience in the Horse Club Adventures : Lakeside Collection

name: Panic in Sweets Land
description: Crushing combos and beat up enemies! No complicated controls, just fun with a variety of fighting actions! The joy and faults of a pretty magical girl knocking down her enemies? Yes, please! A delicious and crazy action game with bright and colorful sweet action!

name: Beat Saber: Queen Music Pack
description:
Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Queen to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Queen and slash the beats in our brand new Queen Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!

Queen Music Pack includes the tracks:

Another One Bites the Dust
Bohemian Rhapsody
Crazy Little Thing Called Love
Don’t Stop Me Now
I Want It All
Killer Queen
One Vision
Somebody to Love
Stone Cold Crazy
We Are The Champions
We Will Rock You

name: The Legend of Zelda: Fall of Hyrule
description: ActionGamer is here to present to you the official sequel in the Triforce Power Saga, The Legend of Zelda: Fall of Hyrule. It has every feature and improvement you loved about Triforce Power and more.

name: Bee in the Valley
description: Be Like a Bee: Fly, Collect, and Attack in a Buzzing Journey through the Undiscovered Valleys!

name: Waifu Space Conquest
description: Kill the aliens and enjoy the cyberpunk aesthetic

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 9: Asuka R♯
description: Adds Asuka R♯ to the roster of playable characters

name: Idle: Multipliers
description: An Idle game for your fun and relaxation. Multipliers based prestige system and various gameplay possibilities

name: Axe Me Down
description: An Indie Platform Battler where your main objective is to push your friends off the screen with throwing Axes. Available for two to six players.

name: Santa's Monster Shootout
description: Monsters and Zombies from all the world are trying to steal the gift packages, they want it all and they want it now. But Santa has guns, big guns!

name: Cream Soda Club
description: Cream Soda Club is a new word in the tycoon genre. Become a nightclub manager. Throw parties with Cream Soda. Decorate the dance floor, jazz up your club, unlock new tracks. Make yourself into the best event manager in the virtual world!

name: Missing Critters
description: Embark on a delightful adventure and seek out the Missing Critters hidden within intricate cartoon scenes, with a soothing lo-fi soundtrack and no time limits - just relax and unwind. Enjoy a captivating experience that will provide fresh challenges, as each play-through is unique.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Dropout!
description: Meet a diverse cast of 9 cute crossdressing characters as they challenge you in block-sliding puzzle action! Score points to unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Big Sword Hero
description: A platform fighting game with 4-player local, a party game that guarantees the mix between fun and epic battles with tense disputes. Simple mechanics and with varied maps and modes, each dispute is always unique.

name: Move the Pin: Classic Logic Puzzle
description: Classic ball puzzle - color each ball, pull the pin and fill the glass with colored balls!

name: Gun and Girl
description: Experience the combination of shooting and puzzle elements

name: Pegafuerte el Terrible
description: You are a man with a mission: shoot all the aliens that are trying to take over the world and rescue your little town "the powerful candle" Side scrolling platform game, similar to "Metal Slug", single player, offline, many checkpoints and varied levels!

name: Little Duty 1
description: Little Duty is a Multiplayer Game , with simple game mode for now team death match and ffa death match , it is curently simple, because i wanted to try to make it like that , you don 't need to buy guns to make experience for unlocking guns , just lets get some fun each other that's all .

name: The Dark Tower
description: This is a traditional bomber combat mode and arena shooting into a furnace of Rougue maze exploration games, players will play a bomb and accurate and deadly ghost pistol warriors all the way to kill the enemy, gradually uncover the hidden secrets inside the magic tower

name: Gaslamp Cases 5: The Dreadful City
description: Play the 5th part of the Match3 saga! Morgan, Jack, and Eleanor have solved numerous mystical casesin and out London, but their return to London greets them with terror. London is quarantined, caught in the grip of a mysterious illness, with no cure in sight - can they save thousands of lifes?

name: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum - Precious Edition
description:
Whether you are a long-time fan of the world created by J. R. R. Tolkien or whether you are exploring The Lord of the Rings for the first time, the Precious Edition offers an even more immersive game experience.

This edition includes:
- The Lord of the Rings: Gollum
- Lore Compendium
- Sindarin Voiceover
- Art Exhibition
- Original Soundtrack

name: A Hint of Purple
description: A short visual novel about queer love and art. Follow Maya, a once-celebrated painter now paralyzed, as she struggles to accept her new reality and its effects on her relationship. Argue with your Prefrontal Cortex, insult an art critic, befriend the elderly.

name: Alpaca Sprint
description: Run, dodge trees, and see how far you can get in this retro arcade inspired runner!

name: Star Gagnant
description: This new Shmup with its unique rapid fire system will blow you away! !

name: True Disc Golf
description: Realistic disc golf game with easy to learn playability

name: Coloring Pixels: Collection 3
description: A relaxing colouring by numbers game. Enjoy completing a variety of images with differing themes, complexity, and sizes.

name: Aoi Shiro: HD Remaster
description: Japanese adventure game. Aoi Shiro is an adventure game that sets stage in both the modern real world and a mythical world. Aoi Shiro takes place in the same universe as its predecessor, Akai Ito.

name: Tennis Manager 2023
description:
The new Tennis Manager arrives on May 25, 2023 just before Roland Garros. Discover in a few days the presentation of the new features by clicking on the "follow" button and adding the game to your wishlist.
This year Tennis Manager puts team spirit first. Be there !

name: Hush Hush
description: A Visual Novel with a twist - improve skills, charm girls, and learn dangerous secrets... by any means necessary.

name: Device of Bakudan
description: Explore and destroy levels with magic bombs to get revenge on a corrupted mage in this 2D action platformer!

name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister - Palace of Ice
description: Although the heroes of Caer Cyflen managed to prevent the Soraks' attempt at reopening the Rift to unleash their foul god upon Solasta, the threat is far from over. Kingdom of Gallivan has suddenly declared war on their neighbours, and the Snow Alliance is calling for your help!

name: Welcome Kokuri-san
description: Welcome Kokuri-san is a visual novel starring the VTuber Kurune Kokuri. The story is fully voiced, and will include scenes with realistic ASMR voices, so you can enjoy the scenario “as if you were there.”

name: Lorena and the Land of Ruins
description: Lorena and the Land of Ruins is a third-person 3D platform shooter in which you explore a beautiful fantasy world filled with many mysteries and ruins of the past!

name: Carnage Offering Tower Defense
description: The replicator robots are back! It's 2528. The machines are increasingly infecting the planets with genetically modified monsters. Challenge them and try to stop the onslaught. Upgrade buildings and heroes, mine resources, discover technology and fight to save humanity!

name: Vaccine Rebirth
description: Enter once again into the world of Survival Horror.

name: Fake Signals
description: Fake Signals is an action hybrid rogue-lite that secretly infiltrates enemy camps and acquires various weapons to fight.

name: Nith Realms
description: A free-flow action-adventure game with varied realms to travel through. The player will have to defeat powerful bosses and take on dangerous environments in order to obtain the all-powerful elements to take back the Nith.

name: Dead Town Tales
description: Dead Town Tales is a deck building strategy game.

name: Bustafellows: Season 2
description:
Bustafellows Season 2 is an otome visual novel developed and published by eXtend.

Everyone wants answers. Who is to blame? What went wrong? And what must the punishment be? To preserve the state of the world, everything is either black or white. Those who focus on the in-between will only continue to suffer.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1+2S
description: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1+2S is the official Mashiro after story for Aokana.Experience even more Aokana in 1440p!

name: Akai Ito & Aoi Shiro HD Remaster
description:
Akai Ito is set in the present age, the game unfolds from the point of view of Kei Hato, a girl who has a special blood called "Nieno Chi". A special system called the blood sucking system is used.

Aoi Shiro is an adventure game that sets stage in both the modern real world and a mythical world. Aoi Shiro takes place in the same universe as its predecessor, Akai Ito.

name: Hello Neighbor: Search and Rescue
description: Hello Neighbor: Search and Rescue is a groundbreaking VR horror-puzzle game where you sneak into your creepy neighbor's house to save your friend.

name: Hot Heat Reset
description: A fast-paced maze action game where you play as an unknown speedster hiding under a skull who is in pursuit to recover his stolen lands and is about to deal with a lot of Explosion! Get ready to RESET everything!

name: Dreamcutter
description: The Dreamcutter, a mysterious scythe with an ulterior motive, promises sexy rewards and a chance at escape. What strange dangers and exotic encounters will you find inside your own mind?

name: Railway Empire 2
description: In Railway Empire 2, grow your company into the largest railway company of the continent and outsmart your competitors as you connect cities and companies with an ever-expanding network of rail lines, bridges, and tunnels. Railway Empire 2 features bigger, more detailed and lively maps than ever before. The whole of the US and continental Europe are covered in two huge, sprawling maps, whilst more detailed maps put the focus on specific regions of each continent. Improved track construction helps you focus on the important decisions as you drive the economy and help the growth of the cities. Signals are placed automatically, bridges can hold up to 4 tracks and the expandable train stations can now have up to 8 tracks.

name: Summer Trip Cruise
description: Hey you, we need a captain! Drive the cruise ship with the on-screen rudder, avoid obstacles, take pictures and enjoy the ride. Take it easy... or take the challenge!

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1S
description: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1S is an expanded port of the original game, now featuring new scenes.

name: Tiny Island
description: Meditative and fluffy God simulator in VR wherein you will help tiny people with chopsticks!

name: Kung Fu Legend
description: An open-world adventure with lots of humor and stimulating combat.

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099
description: Spy on strangers through security cameras, invade their privacy and discover their intimate secrets in this digital voyeur simulator. Welcome to the future of The Primate Observation Club. Even in 2099 the golden rule about messing with your unlucky subjects still remains: Do not feed the monkeys!

name: Hello Goodboy
description:
Hello Goodboy - a cozy and wholesome narrative adventure game about finding the purpose of your journey in the afterlife, together with a huggable cute doggo.

Play as Iko, a kid new to the afterlife without a memory of their past, trying to find the purpose of their journey in this place. You will be accompanied by Coco, a cute and huggable dog that will help solve the mysteries and will always be by your side.

In Hello Goodboy, you will meet various souls on their own adventures through the afterlife, experience heart-warming stories from them that are full of kind messages, help their problems by clearing lightweight challenges, and enjoy time with delicious food together. There are several paths to the end to find the purpose of your journey, but the choices and time are limited, so decide well how you will spend your time with.

name: Marlon’s Mystery: The Darkside of Crime
description: Marlon’s Mystery: The Darkside of Crime will test your skills as an investigator. Join Abby Marlon to solve the riddles in this captivating mystery and hidden object game. Embark on an enigmatic adventure and discover the darkest secrets of the Taylor family.

name: End of Lines
description: Travel across landscapes devastated by a catastrophic climate meltdown, following a small family in search of somewhere habitable. With limited supplies and facing potential death at every turn, your choices will decide their fate. Will they manage to settle down?

name: Bat Boy
description:
A Sentai sports hero 8-bit action adventure!

Bat Boy and his fellow sports-star friends secretly battle against the evil invading forces of Lord Vicious, hell-bent on hosting sinister athletic events for his own amusement!

name: Heliopolis Six
description: In Heliopolis Six you construct and manage your own space station. Join station parts together in 3D, extend them with modules, collect and distribute resources and ensure live support. As station director, good management is the most important aspect of your job, since space is a dangerous place.

name: Evil Wizard
description: Evil Wizard is a humor-filled action RPG that puts you in the shoes of a former Final Boss. Rise from defeat, rediscover long lost powers, and fight to reclaim your castle from an army of so-called heroes.

name: Puzzle Compound
description: Puzzle Compound is an online cooperative multiplayer puzzle solving game where 2-4 friends gather clues, work together and explore multiple locations with the goal of escaping.

name: Above Snakes
description: Piece by piece, create your own world and survive in this Wild West-inspired survival RPG. Craft, farm, hunt, build your base, and fight in order to stay alive.

name: Dynopunk
description:
Imagine no asteroid hit the Earth, and millions of years later dinosaurs created their own society. You are the last surviving TRex trying to reach crazy dream of creating time machine.

Dynopunk is a visual novel that combines a unique repairing simulator with the ability to directly influence your clients' attitudes.

name: Onigo Hunter
description: Embark on a quest to find the missing King and become the ultimate hunter in this turn-based RPG. Set traps to capture monsters, transform them into equipment and items, and complete challenges!

name: Protodroid Delta
description: Reach your potential in a fast and fluid 3D action-platformer set in a beautiful and hopeful Solarpunk world. Take on challenging bosses, upgrade your systems, and show humanity the promise of AI.

name: Landlord's Super
description: Your quintessential construction simulator is here. Take a dodgy loan, restore a property, move in the locals, attend to their grievances, then celebrate with a pint in this fully-simulated, open-world 1980's Britain.

name: Purple Noise Echo
description: Purple Noise Echo is a dark neon atmospheric tactical game. Start from nothing, explore singular environments and discover the gameplay, the world, and the story along the way.

name: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum
description: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum is a story-driven action adventure. Take on a perilous journey as Gollum, chasing the only thing that is precious to him. Gollum is skillful and cunning, but also torn by his split personality. One mind, two egos - you decide!

name: Nature Hunter
description: A video game about animals, insects, mushrooms, ruins, Nature, all through the seasons in open world.

name: Kanji de Go!
description: Kanji de GO! is a free game developed by Micelle, on PC in 2023. Type the reading of the displayed kanji(Chinese character) within the time limit. There are several other modes of entering calculation results and English spelling.

name: Cat Simulator 2
description: Experience life as an actual cat, embark on adventures through expansive residences and breathtaking gardens. Select from a variety of cats and personalize their appearance to your liking. Test your skills in time-based challenges and, of course, revel in annoying humans. Engage in playful interactions with fellow kittens through the exciting new multiplayer mode, inviting friends or competing against individuals from across the globe!

name: Idle Breaker: Loot and Survive
description:
Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world where the undead roam! Embrace the thrill of smashing through everything in sight, from shattering windows to crumbling the buildings, all while scavenging for vital resources.

Brace yourself against hordes of zombies as you unleash your inner survivor. Gear up with crafty makeshift weapons, upgrade them and make the undead tremble!

name: Fetish Locator Week Three
description: The last chapter of Fetish Locator is finally here! Our girls are returning for one last ride filled with seduction and a lot of sex! Try to uncover all mysteries surrounding the Fetish Locator App. Romance more than 20 girls and discover more secrets as you shape the conclusion of your story in Fetish Locator Week 3.

name: Liminal Memory
description: Walking simulator, where you finish levels to recover your memories. Firstly started as 1 month visual project, ended up being complete game. Features PSX graphics and liminal aesthetic as main style.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 6
description: The sixth season (also known as Double Trouble) of Love Island: The Game was released on May 24, 2023. Episodes will be made available weekly on Wednesdays.

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project 2023
description: RAMP 2023 is the third edition of the Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project! Like the others before it, it's a compilation of 296 maps submitted by members of the Doom community, both new and old. The game is centered around a hub level, with completion of the submitted maps allowing players to progress in the hub.

name: Terminal Stages of Nostalgia
description: A moderate-to-large single map for vanilla Doom II.

name: Genshin Impact: Duel! The Summoners' Summit!
description:
Version 3.7 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New character: Kirara
• New major update for Genius Invokation TCG
• New hangout events for Kaveh
• New story quest for Yoimiya
• New main event: Duel! The Summoners' Summit!
• …and more!

name: What Remains of Us
description: When you left the capital to escape the clutches of the sun god's council, you hoped that you could put your past behind you and start anew. Unfortunately for you, pasts always have a way of catching up to people; and yours just happened to come in the package of a bleeding man at your doorway.

name: The Little Mermaid
description: The Little Mermaid was a browser game by McDonald's that was only playable on mobile devices. The game was based on the 2023 movie of the same name and was made to promote the Happy Meal campaign based on it.

name: Super Metroid CRE 3
description:
It's finally time for the completion of the CRE trilogy!

Samus ends up inside of the CRE tileset, filled with janky art, for the final time.
Now with custom stuff!

name: Young Street
description:
Before bipedal apes invented radio receivers, before we exchanged our gills for lungs, there was radio.
Man-made transmissions mutate and extend the electrosphere.

Remember the alien face of nature!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 06: Taizo Kiyokura
description: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Beat Saber: Monstercat Music Pack Vol. 1
description:
Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Monstercat to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Monstercat and slash the beats in our brand new Monstercat Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!

Monstercat Music Pack includes the tracks:

- 'Boundless' - Aero Chord
- 'Emoji VIP' - Pegboard Nerds
- 'Epic' - Tokyo Machine
- 'Feeling Stronger (feat. Charlotte Colley) [High Maintenance Remix]' - Muzzy
- 'Overkill' - RIOT
- 'Rattlesnake' - Rogue
- 'Stronger (feat. Emel)' - Stonebank
- 'This Time' - Kayzo
- 'Till It's Over' - Tristam
- 'We Won't Be Alone (feat. Laura Brehm)' - Feint

name: McDonald's Chicken McNugget Tetris
description: McDonald's Chicken McNugget Tetris is a handheld version of Tetris released in exclusively in China to celebrate the 40th anniversary of the Chicken McNugget.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Frost Heir Edition
description: Worn by the chosen herald of Vahlmir, this armor is imbued with the power of the Winter's Wrath. Anyone who stands in the warrior's way will meet their end in a torrent of ice and fire.

name: Travel Cuisine: Collector's Edition
description: Tammy and Matthew dream of owning their own restaurant! But how can you achieve your dreams without the much-needed experience and capital? The culinary tournament is the solution to all problems.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Heretic Edition
description:
The Heretic Edition of Cult of the Lamb includes:
- The base game
- The Heretic pack
- The Cultist pack

name: Palm Tetris
description: Palm Tetris is a puzzle game built on various cubes of different colors that need to be decomposed so as to fill the entire void.

name: Twilight Struggle: Red Sea
description: Answer the summons of the trumpets and bear the burden of the Twilight Struggle. Set during the ideological tension of the Cold War, Twilight Struggle: Red Sea places the United States and the Soviet Union at odds in the Horn of Africa. Every choice you make will impact the balance of power.

name: Rite as Rain
description: Open world rpg puzzle game with turn based combat

name: Wheat Fairy of Daya
description: Play as a wheat fairy, using the magical energy of the wheat field to dispel the threats of wheat! Combine different skills to make your own attack style! And let the wheat grow and harvest smoothly under the test of other nature fairies.

name: Dream Job: Delivery Simulator
description: Delivery simulator in pre-solar punk world.

name: Broken Minds
description: Broken minds is a CASUAL TURN COMBAT RPG, with a rich lore, where you control a 13 year old boy, in a mission to overcome his trauma

name: Laid-Back Camp: Have a nice day!
description: The first smartphone game with all the elements of the TV anime "Laid-Back Camp" is finally here! Familiar characters such as Nadeshiko Kagamihara, Rin Shima, Chiaki Ōgaki, Aoi Inuyama, and Ena Saitō engage in rich dialogue with motion and full voice acting, as well as over 1,000 camping gear and vehicles, delicious-looking camp meals, and beautiful scenery from Yamanashi, Nagano, and Shizuoka, among other locations. More elements from the TV anime 'Laid-Back Camp' are expected to be appeared soon!

name: Internull
description: After waking up in the facilities of a once-successful tech company, you must find your way out and uncover the mysteries of Internull with your only tool being a Virtual Reality Headset.

name: Only Up!
description: Embark on an exciting journey in Only UP! Exploring a huge world full of secrets and mysteries, you have to get as high as possible, and the most interesting starts above the clouds...

name: Akai Ito: HD Remaster
description: Japanese adventure game. Set in the present age, the game unfolds from the point of view of Kei Hato, a girl who has a special blood called "Nieno Chi". A special system called the blood sucking system is used.

name: Dark Quest 3
description: A rogue-lite tabletop that mixes card based exploration with turn based combat. Create your party, draw adventure cards, roll dice and fight monsters to defeat the sorcerer and his magic.

name: The Druid
description: We embody the spirit of The Dagda, king of the Celtic gods, with the objective of liberating his territory from the corruption of the goddess Morrigan in a 2D roguelike platformer full of intensity.

name: Batsugun: Saturn Tribute Boosted
description: Batsugun is a vertical scrolling shooter arcade game released in 1993 by Toaplan. The game attracted attention for the large number of bullets shot by both enemies and allies. This led many games to adopt the same kind of play. Batsugun thus became the pioneer of the bullet hell genre. The “Special” version of the game was then released on home consoles. The Special version offers new features with a better sound.

name: Five Nights at Tinky's
description: Five nights at Tinky's is a indie horror game, where you apply for a job as a nightguard at the "Tinkys Lasagne Place". You only need to work for 5 nights to receive your payment, but soon you will find out that you are not alone... Can you survive the 5 nights?

name: Frogvival
description: You are what you eat indeed and in Frogvival you can really experience that assessment. Frogvival is a survival game where you can devour animals to mutate into them!

name: Metro Manager LA
description: Metro Manager LA is a strategy simulation game about connecting communities throughout Los Angeles. Manage maintenance, security, wait time, and train capacity as you attempt to keep the riders of Los Angeles happy.

name: Sunshine Shuffle
description: Sunshine Shuffle is a narrative poker adventure featuring talking animals with criminal pasts and adorable outfits! Play Texas Hold 'Em with the remaining members of the 'Morning Shift', a group of working-class creatures turned would-be Robin Hoods who crossed the Fishie Mob, and mostly lived to tell the tale. Unravel the story of how the largest bank on the Eastern Seaboard was robbed in a single afternoon as you play. Win hands to earn tokens and decorate the S.S. Sunshine with new light fixtures, chairs, card decks, and more. And try to boogie to the game's vibrant, wiggle-inducing original ska soundtrack as you stare into the cold eyes of a 12 year-old kitten with nothing left to lose.

name: Sound Hidden Forest
description: buzz, ribbit, kaboom! Let's walk around the stage with cute characters and make various sounds to find the same sound as the song of parakeet.

name: Astro Traveler
description: A retro style space sim where you mine, trade, bounty hunt, pillage, and explore. In this game you choose you own path as you navigate the galaxy while balancing faction alligence and legality of your actions.

name: Shinobi Non Grata
description: Shinobi alert! Use your 7 shinobi weapons to survive the bloodshed! Introducing a hard core 2D ninja action game by Hyper-retro graphics.

name: Super Astrovade
description: Super Astrovade is a shoot-em up with no shooting. A bullet hell without bullets. Evade enemies and absorb stardust to unleash a powerful supernova bomb that destroys everything around you. Evade, absorb, destroy, survive.

name: 3D Puzzle: Port
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Saboteur Weapon and Skin Pack
description:
Two new weapons and a Liberator character skin for Karl await in the latest content drop from Season Pass Two.

Both the Grease Gun and TERA rifle are now available as part of your arsenal. The TERA is a lightweight adaptation of the Type 38 that was originally designed for Japanese Paratroopers, this rifle is incredibly fast to equip and aim down the sight. With low levels of recoil, it provides both accuracy and a rapid rate of fire in the right hands.

Designed to be a light, reliable and mass-produced weapon, the Grease Gun is an SMG with great mobility that is very easy to control, even under sustained firing, thanks to its low rate of fire and recoil. Despite its low muzzle velocity, the stability and control on offer make it a solid choice for slightly longer ranged combat encounters.

Finally, the Liberator Skin celebrates the liberation of Paris. Karl can now sport a classic French Resistance appearance complete with signature armband.

name: Aria
description: Sin descripción

name: Good Idea!
description: Made for the Jame Gam #28. A sorta prequel to Good Job!

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap

name: Monster Menu: The Scavenger's Cookbook - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of Monster Menu: The Scavenger's Cookbook includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- "Survival of the Fullest" Artbook
- "Chef's Select" 2-disc Soundtrack
- "Avid Adventurous Eater" Apron
- "Spice It Up" Salt & Pepper Shakers
- "Greetings from the Dungeon Diners" Art Cards (Set of 4)
- Collector's Box

name: The Secret of NecroNancy
description: Necronancy is an undead summoning puzzle platformer. You cannot attack the heavily armored knights yourself. So you will need to learn how to summon minions like Mr Bones, Skello Kitty, Chompers, and other unspeakable skeletal abominations to clear the path forward.

name: Banana Mountain
description: Banana Mountain is a "beginner" Celeste campaign consisting of three chapters of increasing challenges.

name: Birds Aren't Real
description: A short story-driven psychological horror game. No visual jumpscares; only mentally disturbing.

name: The Last Note From Dad
description: A short horror experience on a supposedly uninhabited island.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Riot Bundle
description: Experience the Riot Bundle, featuring the all-new Riot Mode, new animations showcasing lethal kills, and an exciting new cosmetic collection.

name: Mega Man: The Sequel Wars - Episode Red
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Woodfrog and the Sequel Wars Team

name: Pizza Hero
description:
Welcome to Pizza Hero, the exciting new shoot 'em up roguelite that puts a delicious twist on the genre! In this game, you'll play as a brave pizza who must defend the world from an invasion of enemies.
As you battle your way through the game, you'll have the opportunity to choose from a variety of different toppings that will grant you special abilities. For example, selecting pepperoni will give you a grenade, allowing you to deal splash damage. Or, if you're feeling saucy, you can choose blue cheese to create a pungent parameter around your pizza, damaging any foes that come too close.

name: Super Mario & Sonic
description: Super Mario & Sonic is an unofficial 2D platformer featuring both Mario and Sonic.

name: Cities: Skylines - Piano Tunes Radio
description: “Piano Tunes” is the perfect Radio Station for those of you who love classical, whimsical, elegant piano music. With 16 songs and approximately one hour of music, your city will rise flawlessly from your fingertips!

name: Cities: Skylines - 90s Pop Radio
description: 90’s lovers out there, this Radio Station is for you! With “90’s Pop” you'll fall in love with this incredible music once again: enjoy 16 new tracks and almost one hour of music.

name: Minecraft: Sonic Texture Pack
description: See the world through the eyes of Sonic, your favorite blue hedgehog! This complete texture pack, inspired by iconic zones like Green Hill and Labyrinth, transforms your entire world into a unique but familiar landscape! Just beware the hostile mobs — they've gotten a Badnik new look!

name: Cities: Skylines - Hotels & Retreats Bundle
description:
The Hotels & Retreats bundle includes a mini-expansion for Cities: Skylines, alongside a selection of content and music to keep your cities thriving for a long time. Get Hotels & Retreats, and enjoy buildings and music inspired by cities the world over!

The bundle includes:
- “Hotels & Retreats” Mini-expansion
- “Brooklyn & Queens” Content Creator Pack
- “Railroads of Japan” Content Creator Pack
- “Industrial Evolution” Content Creator Pack
- “Piano Tunes” Radio Station
- “90’s Pop” Radio Station

name: Desert Bus
description: Desert Bus is a mod for Undertale that recreates the original game of Desert Bus with an 8 hour long room in Undertale.

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Modstand Bundle
description:
The Gerda: A Flame in Winter Modstand Bundle contains:

Gerda: A Flame in Winter (main game)
Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Liva's Story (DLC)

name: World of Goo Remastered
description:
They're squirmy and curious! Drag and drop living Goo Balls to build everything from bridges to giant tongues in this physics-based puzzle game.
The millions of Goo Balls that live in the beautiful World of Goo are curious to explore — but they don't know that they're in a game, or that they're extremely delicious. Connect the Goo Balls to build a wide range of jiggly architecture, including: bridges, cannonballs, and zeppelins.

name: MoonBeam
description: ‘Moonbeam' will bring you a brand new tower defense game experience. You will enter a magical world made up of sun birds and ice cream. In this world, you will need to use careful analysis and strategic placement of various weapons to experience the fun of defeating enemies and gaining resources.

name: True Survivors Bundle
description: Jump into Dying Light franchise with the latest bundle encompassing both installments.

name: Wobbledogs: Console Edition
description: Raise your own hive of mutating dogs, physically simulated down to their guts!

name: Tilting Tiles: Micro Challenge
description: Tilting Tiles: Micro Challenge is the third installment in the Tilting Tiles series. Micro Challenge brings an entire new take on the unique puzzle series by adding new player movement options and new terrain tiles. Whether you are a fan of the series or a first time player, this is the perfect place to start.

name: Triad Ball
description: In NeoFuturistTown, anarchy reigns. The underworld barons have taken control and are fighting for territory. To put an end to these confrontations, a brilliant inventor proposed to settle the conflicts by triad matches. A sport created by this man of science.

name: Raventure
description: In Raventure, you play as a brave warrior on a perilous journey across a scorching desert.

name: Lord of the Click: Interstellar Wars
description: Let's do it once more, people! New chapter of the critically acclaimed Lord of the Click series is finally here. And it's tetralogy now meaning we're done with the trilogy thing and up for something bigger. Interstellar Wars take the neverending conflict to a whole new level — in space!

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Liva's Story
description: Become the leader your team needs you to be in Liva's Story. Play as Liva - the Sparrow - after she and her small group of Resistance members are forced to flee Copenhagen and retreat to the small village of Tinglev.

name: Circuit Breakout: Dual Polarity
description: Unravel the mysteries of a derelict facility as you control two characters with unique abilities simultaneously in this thought-provoking 3D puzzle adventure.

name: Anno 1800: Fiesta Pack
description: Celebrate the cultural boom of the New World and beautify your residents' neighborhoods with a combination of over 20 new ornaments and skin variations!

name: Balls and Coins
description: Are you looking for a definite solution to boredom? Then you are in the right place. Physics-based running game Balls and Coins promise excitement, tranquility, and peace of mind, while also pushing your limits. Avoid enemies and obstacles, collect coins, and be the who achieves the highest score.

name: Runner Roy
description: Runner Roy is a sidescroller platformer where you have to count both on your skills and luck to overcome (and survive!) as many machines and obstacles along the way as you can.

name: Dark Desire Mute 5
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Deep
description: In Season of the Deep, Guardians must travel to Saturn's moon of Titan and investigate an unexpected distress call. Guardians are tasked with diving into the depths of it's methane ocean to uncover ancient secrets and disrupt the Taken and Hive rituals beneath the waves.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Industrial Evolution
description: Walk the path of history with “Industrial Evolution”, from Community Creator Samantha “Avanya” Woods. This Content Creator Pack includes a new set of growable buildings that span different eras of industrial building styles, from red brick walls to modern, sleek industrial complexes.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Brooklyn & Queens
description: Cities are ever-changing, and this Pack from Content Creator Prosper explores the neighborhoods of Brooklyn and Queens. “Brooklyn & Queens” is a set of medium-rise high-density residential buildings and props for decorating the facade and rooftops.

name: 3D Puzzle: Last of City
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Railroads of Japan
description: Discover Japan by train thanks to “Railroads of Japan” from Content Creator Ryuichi Kaminogi. This Content Creator Pack adds authentic Japanese railroad scenery to Cities: Skylines with stations, trains, buses, and more!

name: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels
description: Dear warriors of the Kingmaker Academy! Face your talented colleagues in challenging duels at our school's most important tournament! Improve your skills with each duel, become the king of warriors and rule the school. But beware, remember it's a roguelike! You dont want to be eliminated, do you?!

name: Convergence: A League of Legends Story - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Convergence: A League of Legends Story includes:
- Star Guardian Ekko Skin Pack
- Ruined Ekko Skin Pack
- Convergence Digital Comic and Art Book

Rewind the Past, Control the Future

Traverse the sprawling city of Zaun as Ekko, a young inventor with a device to rewind time. He and his friends must work together to keep their city safe, but as danger looms and secrets come to light, Ekko realizes he can't trust anyone—not even himself.

name: Cities: Skylines - Hotels & Retreats
description: Spruce up your City with the finest hôtellerie with “Hotels & Retreats”! Start with a small hotel chain and unlock more luxurious and specialized hotels as you make your way to a successful hotel business.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: The Dark Throne
description: Patch 6.4 introduces the next raid dungeon Pandæmonium: Anabaseios, a new trial and a new Instanced, Variant and Criterion dungeon.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Medved Hellraiser
description: Fun 3D first-person shooter, with humorous funny bosses, sounds and dialogues.

name: Farming Simulator 23: Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Load up your Boltgun and plunge into battle headfirst! Experience a perfect blend of Warhammer 40,000, classic, frenetic FPS gameplay and the stylish visuals of your favourite 90’s retro shooters.

name: Farming Simulator 23
description:
From plowing to harvesting to selling your products, Farming Simulator 23 invites players to take control of their own farm to build an agricultural empire! The latest edition of the internationally acclaimed Farming Simulator franchise opens a whole new chapter: More machines from real brands, two maps, new crops and animals, seasonal visual effects and production chains offer seemingly endless open-world gameplay in a familyfriendly environment.

Players choose the kind of farmers they want to be, whether cultivating fields, logging with forestry equipment, or tending to farm animals such as the newly added chicken. Production chains extend the business allowing players to sell products like bread, olive oil or furniture. The improved tutorial mode, AI helper and the new auto-load feature for logs and pallets support the players in their farming career.

name: Pawperty Damage
description: Smash, kick, stomp and chomp your way through a fully destructible city! Go to town in this cathartic action sandbox, either alone or in split screen local multiplayer.

name: After Us
description: Explore the corners of a surrealistic post-human world to give life on Earth a second chance in this touching story about sacrifice and hope.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra2S
description: Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue Extra2S is an expanded port of the original game, now featuring new scenes.

name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim
description: It's got action! It's got romance! In this RPG-Dating Sim, gather your party and try to settle a centuries-old dispute among your monster and human classmates! The fate of Winter Prom is at stake!

name: Annie and the AI
description: Step into the role of Esme, an AI built by Annie but built for what purpose? Evolve and learn by solving visual puzzles accompanied by beautiful hand-drawn artwork. Learn all about Annie's life, befriend her, and grow together.

name: Monster Menu: The Scavenger's Cookbook - Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition of Monster Menu: The Scavenger’s Cookbook includes:
- The Game
- Digital Soundtrack (download code)
- Softcover Art book
- Reversible Cover

name: Mega Man: The Sequel Wars
description: Mega Man: The Sequel Wars is a fan-made homebrew remake of Mega Man 4, 5 and 6 for the Sega Mega Drive, following in the footsteps of the officially released Mega Man: The Wily Wars. It aims to carefully recreate the NES classics while giving them a fresh 16-bit coat of paint and a rearranged soundtrack. More than that however, it also aims to bring a slew of new content, both through complete re-imaginings of the classics in EX Mode and a new gauntlet of levels in Wily Tower 2. And it all runs on the original Mega Drive hardware!

developers.name: Woodfrog and the Sequel Wars Team

name: Puzzle Bobble Everybubble!
description: A new title in the Puzzle Bobble series featuring a four player co-op story mode.

name: Castle Helios
description: Puzzle exploration for Playdate

name: The Lost Village
description: Once there was a prosperous village of Martials, now none of it remains. As the son of the former Master, you will lead your followers to rebuild this village. Recruit followers and enter the mysterious illusional domain, acquire lost wonders. Will you see the rebirth of ancestors’ glory again?

name: Necrocrisis
description: Necrocrisis is an on-rails fight for your life through a graveyard full of gun-toting zombies.
